loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.

string.last_approved_text: Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!

string.last_approved_text: Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.

string.last_approved_text: Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.

string.last_approved_text: The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.

string.last_approved_text: Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: Wrongs are about to be righted. Prepare yourselves.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Wrongs are about to be righted. Prepare yourselves.

string.last_approved_text: Two moves ahead. That is how one sees victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Two moves ahead. That is how one sees victory.

string.last_approved_text: Single combat will determine your fate.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Single combat will determine your fate.

string.last_approved_text: I will wipe away my previous defeat.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will wipe away my previous defeat.

string.last_approved_text: You wish to try your blade against me, again?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You wish to try your blade against me, again?

string.last_approved_text: Each duel is a test of wits, don't you think?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Each duel is a test of wits, don't you think?

string.last_approved_text: Do not oppose me. You should have learned.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not oppose me. You should have learned.

string.last_approved_text: Was the last bout not enough for you?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Was the last bout not enough for you?

string.last_approved_text: Your friendship is irrelevant. Your opposition is unacceptable.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your friendship is irrelevant. Your opposition is unacceptable.

string.last_approved_text: I will make this quick. You have earned that.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will make this quick. You have earned that.

string.last_approved_text: You have chosen unwisely but it changes nothing.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have chosen unwisely but it changes nothing.

string.last_approved_text: I am sorry, but I will not relent.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am sorry, but I will not relent.

string.last_approved_text: You have stood in my way far too long.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have stood in my way far too long.

string.last_approved_text: No longer will you bar my path.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No longer will you bar my path.

string.last_approved_text: Enough is enough. You will be removed.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough is enough. You will be removed.

string.last_approved_text: You cannot forestall my plans. I will see to that.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot forestall my plans. I will see to that.

string.last_approved_text: Your constant interruptions are a nuisance, nothing more.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your constant interruptions are a nuisance, nothing more.

string.last_approved_text: My plans cannot be halted by your incessant attempts.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My plans cannot be halted by your incessant attempts.

string.last_approved_text: How many times must you try?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How many times must you try?

string.last_approved_text: So we fight again. It is becoming tiresome.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So we fight again. It is becoming tiresome.

string.last_approved_text: You have frustrated my plans for the last time.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have frustrated my plans for the last time.

string.last_approved_text: I shall overcome you, then resume my agenda.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall overcome you, then resume my agenda.

string.last_approved_text: The last time was an oversight. Now, victory will be mine.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The last time was an oversight. Now, victory will be mine.

string.last_approved_text: I have corrected my previous errors. No more foolish mistakes.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have corrected my previous errors. No more foolish mistakes.

string.last_approved_text: Never underestimate anyone who may affect your designs…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Never underestimate anyone who may affect your designs…

string.last_approved_text: No matter whom, if they oppose me they must die.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No matter whom, if they oppose me they must die.

string.last_approved_text: I do not have time for unknown quantities.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not have time for unknown quantities.

string.last_approved_text: I will not let these newcomers become a nuisance.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will not let these newcomers become a nuisance.

string.last_approved_text: Your strength is impressive. I must overcome it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your strength is impressive. I must overcome it.

string.last_approved_text: How many times have I been frustrated by failure now?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How many times have I been frustrated by failure now?

string.last_approved_text: I must think further ahead to defeat you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I must think further ahead to defeat you.

string.last_approved_text: I must be wiser. I will be. You will fall.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I must be wiser. I will be. You will fall.

string.last_approved_text: We move with victorious momentum. It cannot be stopped.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We move with victorious momentum. It cannot be stopped.

string.last_approved_text: I will not underestimate you, but again, defeat you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will not underestimate you, but again, defeat you.

string.last_approved_text: You have become good practice, if nothing else.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have become good practice, if nothing else.

string.last_approved_text: If you must try again, so be it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If you must try again, so be it.

string.last_approved_text: So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: China is in chaos. Yet through this chaos, I have found opportunity. These people - these bickering people, they stack so well. It makes them easier to order, to control. I alone will bring peace to China. Those who stand against me will vanish.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China is in chaos. Yet through this chaos, I have found opportunity. These people - these bickering people, they stack so well. It makes them easier to order, to control. I alone will bring peace to China. Those who stand against me will vanish.

string.last_approved_text: Please, give me a reason to remain here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Please, give me a reason to remain here.

string.last_approved_text: Will you provide a challenge? Or an opportunity?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Will you provide a challenge? Or an opportunity?

string.last_approved_text: Is the enemy here before us, or within us?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Is the enemy here before us, or within us?

string.last_approved_text: Let us determine whose will is stronger.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us determine whose will is stronger.

string.last_approved_text: Our progress has been adequate. May it continue.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our progress has been adequate. May it continue.

string.last_approved_text: Our cause is righteous. Victory will come to us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause is righteous. Victory will come to us.

string.last_approved_text: The world will bow before our power.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The world will bow before our power.

string.last_approved_text: I see truth in our purpose, and so too victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I see truth in our purpose, and so too victory.

string.last_approved_text: Hm. Come then, there is work to do.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hm. Come then, there is work to do.

string.last_approved_text: I would rather betray the world, than let the world betray me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I would rather betray the world, than let the world betray me.

string.last_approved_text: Let none stand in the way of our duty.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let none stand in the way of our duty.

string.last_approved_text: Simple strategy, perfectly executed. That is victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Simple strategy, perfectly executed. That is victory.

string.last_approved_text: Treason must be made an example of. No survivors.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Treason must be made an example of. No survivors.

string.last_approved_text: Your hanging entrails will serve as a reminder to others.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your hanging entrails will serve as a reminder to others.

string.last_approved_text: Your crime is crossing me. The sentence is death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your crime is crossing me. The sentence is death.

string.last_approved_text: Your deception will soon be ended. Farewell, traitor.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your deception will soon be ended. Farewell, traitor.

string.last_approved_text: There is much work to do. Deal with this, quickly.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is much work to do. Deal with this, quickly.

string.last_approved_text: Do not expend more energy than is necessary.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not expend more energy than is necessary.

string.last_approved_text: Bring victory quickly, so that we may continue.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring victory quickly, so that we may continue.

string.last_approved_text: Time is of the essence. This task is menial, but it must be done.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Time is of the essence. This task is menial, but it must be done.

string.last_approved_text: Now to battle. Let us do what must be done.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now to battle. Let us do what must be done.

string.last_approved_text: Do not hesitate. Victory must be achieved.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not hesitate. Victory must be achieved.

string.last_approved_text: Whatever must be done, will be done.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Whatever must be done, will be done.

string.last_approved_text: Remember, we do everything for China. Everything.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Remember, we do everything for China. Everything.

string.last_approved_text: These foes must fall. None can defy me and live.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These foes must fall. None can defy me and live.

string.last_approved_text: The price of crossing me is death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The price of crossing me is death.

string.last_approved_text: Give them no quarter. Make them know pain.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Give them no quarter. Make them know pain.

string.last_approved_text: Abject cruelty is an acceptable punishment for their deception.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Abject cruelty is an acceptable punishment for their deception.

string.last_approved_text: A litany of errors has led us to this point…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A litany of errors has led us to this point…

string.last_approved_text: How did I let this happen? We cannot lose here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How did I let this happen? We cannot lose here.

string.last_approved_text: This is an unfortunate development.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is an unfortunate development.

string.last_approved_text: To lose here would be extremely troublesome.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: To lose here would be extremely troublesome.

string.last_approved_text: Our strategy rests on this victory. We cannot lose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our strategy rests on this victory. We cannot lose.

string.last_approved_text: It was unwise to commit so many to this fight…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It was unwise to commit so many to this fight…

string.last_approved_text: We cannot afford to lose here. Victory is essential.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We cannot afford to lose here. Victory is essential.

string.last_approved_text: I feel exposed... Defeat here would be catastrophic.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I feel exposed... Defeat here would be catastrophic.

string.last_approved_text: Good. I know I can count on your support.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Good. I know I can count on your support.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, my friend, we will make them yield.

string.last_approved_text: They cannot overcome our combined wits, friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They cannot overcome our combined wits, friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes. Well spoken. Now let us focus on the battle.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My friend, the war awaits. Shall we?

string.last_approved_text: You speak truly. But now I need your martial power.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak truly. But now I need your martial power.

string.last_approved_text: Bring your strength to battle, friend, and we shall win.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring your strength to battle, friend, and we shall win.

string.last_approved_text: Your comradery will be an asset in battle.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your comradery will be an asset in battle.

string.last_approved_text: You are a tactical necessity. Nothing more.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a tactical necessity. Nothing more.

string.last_approved_text: Do not test my patience. I will kill you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not test my patience. I will kill you.

string.last_approved_text: Your presence portends misfortune.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your presence portends misfortune.

string.last_approved_text: Your continued existence worries me, greatly.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your continued existence worries me, greatly.

string.last_approved_text: Do your duty. I will not waste time with you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do your duty. I will not waste time with you.

string.last_approved_text: I require your swords, not your words.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I require your swords, not your words.

string.last_approved_text: If you cannot win, you are useless to me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If you cannot win, you are useless to me.

string.last_approved_text: Victory is my only concern. Personal feelings are irrelevant.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory is my only concern. Personal feelings are irrelevant.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fine words before a battle. Now, let us begin.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Quite. So, we stand before battle. Let it come.

string.last_approved_text: Apt. Now, prepare your weapons.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Apt. Now, prepare your weapons.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The enemy is awaiting battle. Words can wait.

string.last_approved_text: Come. Talk later. The battle awaits.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come. Talk later. The battle awaits.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Talk is easy. The difficult business of war is imminent.

string.last_approved_text: This war must be won. Let us win it together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This war must be won. Let us win it together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak. I listen. But now, we must BOTH fight.

string.last_approved_text: Do not become a liability to me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not become a liability to me.

string.last_approved_text: You are odious, but useful I suppose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are odious, but useful I suppose.

string.last_approved_text: It is a crime that you must remain, but you must.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is a crime that you must remain, but you must.

string.last_approved_text: Do not test me, brigand.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not test me, brigand.

string.last_approved_text: Do your best, and maybe that will be enough.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do your best, and maybe that will be enough.

string.last_approved_text: Do not fail. The shame would be unbearable.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not fail. The shame would be unbearable.

string.last_approved_text: I have no duty to protect you, so fight well.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have no duty to protect you, so fight well.

string.last_approved_text: Should you die, I will mourn… for a time.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Should you die, I will mourn… for a time.

string.last_approved_text: Honoured friend, may your faith never waver.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Honoured friend, may your faith never waver.

string.last_approved_text: Stay with me, brother, and we will achieve much.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stay with me, brother, and we will achieve much.

string.last_approved_text: Keep your eyes on the ultimate goal, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Keep your eyes on the ultimate goal, brother.

string.last_approved_text: Well said. Your unrelenting spirit will see us through.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Well said. Your unrelenting spirit will see us through.

string.last_approved_text: Well spoken. I trust your words, and your deeds.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Well spoken. I trust your words, and your deeds.

string.last_approved_text: I place my faith in your ability today, and in you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I place my faith in your ability today, and in you.

string.last_approved_text: Is it time to prove our cause is just.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Is it time to prove our cause is just.

string.last_approved_text: It is time. Our unified strength cannot be overcome.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time. Our unified strength cannot be overcome.

string.last_approved_text: Stay with me, sister, and we will achieve much.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stay with me, sister, and we will achieve much.

string.last_approved_text: Keep your eyes on the ultimate goal, sister.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Keep your eyes on the ultimate goal, sister.

string.last_approved_text: Your 'heroism' is betrayal to me. Prepare to die.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your 'heroism' is betrayal to me. Prepare to die.

string.last_approved_text: I do not hate your treachery, only your opposition.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not hate your treachery, only your opposition.

string.last_approved_text: You shall fall. It is not personal.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You shall fall. It is not personal.

string.last_approved_text: There will always be traitors in war. Traitors like you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There will always be traitors in war. Traitors like you.

string.last_approved_text: The leaves begin their slow descent. So too my enemies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The leaves begin their slow descent. So too my enemies.

string.last_approved_text: As the world cools, my ardour rises.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As the world cools, my ardour rises.

string.last_approved_text: Beauty and variety presage the death of nature…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Beauty and variety presage the death of nature…

string.last_approved_text: Let our fortunes depend not on heaven alone.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let our fortunes depend not on heaven alone.

string.last_approved_text: A new season in the relentless march to victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A new season in the relentless march to victory.

string.last_approved_text: These new blossoms shall witness a new China.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These new blossoms shall witness a new China.

string.last_approved_text: The new harvest will be fertilised by blood.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The new harvest will be fertilised by blood.

string.last_approved_text: Let the turn of the seasons not dissuade us from our purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let the turn of the seasons not dissuade us from our purpose.

string.last_approved_text: Relentless heat; I must have your molten resolve.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Relentless heat; I must have your molten resolve.

string.last_approved_text: My foes will fall before the fury of the sun.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My foes will fall before the fury of the sun.

string.last_approved_text: I must be as dispassionate as the blazing sun.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I must be as dispassionate as the blazing sun.

string.last_approved_text: The world wilts before the heat. I must not.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The world wilts before the heat. I must not.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Cold, dispassionate winter. Graveyard of the naïve.

string.last_approved_text: Winter's grasp cannot have me. I have work yet to do.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Winter's grasp cannot have me. I have work yet to do.

string.last_approved_text: The land sleeps under an icy blanket.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The land sleeps under an icy blanket.

string.last_approved_text: Our enemies will feel the icy tendrils of winter.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will know my wrath and shudder.

string.last_approved_text: They shall break before my endless attack!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They shall break before my endless attack!

string.last_approved_text: I shall break their bodies and burn the remains!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall break their bodies and burn the remains!

string.last_approved_text: When I am finished, they will be unrecognisable.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When I am finished, they will be unrecognisable.

string.last_approved_text: These gutless cowards cannot even fight alone!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These gutless cowards cannot even fight alone!

string.last_approved_text: Craven curs! I will see you all cut down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Craven curs! I will see you all cut down!

string.last_approved_text: Bring as many as you like; I'll burn you all!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring as many as you like; I'll burn you all!

string.last_approved_text: Even allied, you cannot stop me! I am your doom!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Even allied, you cannot stop me! I am your doom!

string.last_approved_text: I am not alone. You do not stand a chance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am not alone. You do not stand a chance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We ride as one; our fury is all of China's!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together we will crush them!

string.last_approved_text: Come, allies, come fury!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, allies, come fury!

string.last_approved_text: I have claimed this place. They cannot have it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have claimed this place. They cannot have it!

string.last_approved_text: Begone, you witless fools!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Begone, you witless fools!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Away from my city, you irritable snakes!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough! Die, you filthy usurpers!

string.last_approved_text: Prepare to meet defeat once more!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Prepare to meet defeat once more!

string.last_approved_text: You dogs lack the intellect to learn, it seems!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You dogs lack the intellect to learn, it seems!

string.last_approved_text: So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: Behold me, China! I am beset by traitors on all sides! Once-proud Luoyang is a smouldering ruin; all of China will burn before their mutiny is over! For this sedition can be answered only with merciless fury! I must be the sword of execution, if China is ever to know order again!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Behold me, China! I am beset by traitors on all sides! Once-proud Luoyang is a smouldering ruin; all of China will burn before their mutiny is over! For this sedition can be answered only with merciless fury! I must be the sword of execution, if China is ever to know order again!

string.last_approved_text: I will exact my wrath upon the enemy.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will exact my wrath upon the enemy.

string.last_approved_text: My foul temper demands vengeance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My foul temper demands vengeance!

string.last_approved_text: You should hope these ill omens can be undone.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You should hope these ill omens can be undone.

string.last_approved_text: My fortunes will reverse here, I vow it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My fortunes will reverse here, I vow it!

string.last_approved_text: They call me 'tyrant'? I will SHOW you tyranny!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They call me 'tyrant'? I will SHOW you tyranny!

string.last_approved_text: See the burning lands and know my fury!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: See the burning lands and know my fury!

string.last_approved_text: The world will be remade as *I* desire it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The world will be remade as *I* desire it!

string.last_approved_text: I am China's fury; you cannot stop me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am China's fury; you cannot stop me!

string.last_approved_text: These dogs shall burn!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These dogs shall burn!

string.last_approved_text: I will leave NONE alive!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will leave NONE alive!

string.last_approved_text: Break their bones! Smash their spirit!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Leave nothing of them! Not even DUST!

string.last_approved_text: I will exact a blood price - penance for treason!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will exact a blood price - penance for treason!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Traitors will be torn limb from bloody limb!

string.last_approved_text: No mercy for traitors. No salvation for scum!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No mercy for traitors. No salvation for scum!

string.last_approved_text: I will destroy you for daring to cross me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will destroy you for daring to cross me!

string.last_approved_text: This would be scarce worth my time, yet all treason must be rooted out and destroyed!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This would be scarce worth my time, yet all treason must be rooted out and destroyed!

string.last_approved_text: China will thank us for doing her swift and brutal work.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China will thank us for doing her swift and brutal work.

string.last_approved_text: Channel your fury and let this gruesome business be done quickly!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Channel your fury and let this gruesome business be done quickly!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come! Let us be swift, but merciless. Leave NONE alive!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Talk is done. Now I will have their heads!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough talk; cut out their tongues!

string.last_approved_text: Battle approaches! The price of treason is worse than death!

string.last_approved_text: I cannot lose. I cannot. Not now. Not ever!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I cannot lose. I cannot. Not now. Not ever!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am Dong Zhuo, and I will NOT fade away.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Defend this city, or answer to me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am far worse than anything beyond these walls!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We cannot give them the advantage of victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Well said, I suppose, but now focus!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When we are done here, YOU may be next…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Return with victory, or do not return at all.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China's vitality wanes. Only I can save it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Death stalks the branches, as I stalk my foes.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!

string.last_approved_text: What madness consumes China! This fire must be stopped, lest we all burn! The people suffer as cities burn - it cannot continue! For years I have defended China from numerous threats, it seems now I must take up arms to defend her again. Once more, for China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enemies of China! Prepare to meet your doom!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will have your liar's head, you cur!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have come for these traitors!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must win! The alternative is death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have no choice but to win today.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!

string.last_approved_text: Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!

string.last_approved_text: You speak earnestly, my friend…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak earnestly, my friend…

string.last_approved_text: How true, my friend. Come, to business!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How true, my friend. Come, to business!

string.last_approved_text: Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.

string.last_approved_text: This fight is just beginning. Let us win!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This fight is just beginning. Let us win!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Keep your spirits high, we shall win!

string.last_approved_text: Through unity, we will see victory, friend!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Through unity, we will see victory, friend!

string.last_approved_text: The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!

string.last_approved_text: It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!

string.last_approved_text: You are a cretin; your presence offends me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a cretin; your presence offends me.

string.last_approved_text: What right have you to speak to me? Silence!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What right have you to speak to me? Silence!

string.last_approved_text: You speak, but I hear only deception.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak, but I hear only deception.

string.last_approved_text: You spew nothing but bile; be silent.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You spew nothing but bile; be silent.

string.last_approved_text: You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.

string.last_approved_text: Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.

string.last_approved_text: I am done with your words... done with YOU.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am done with your words... done with YOU.

string.last_approved_text: Well said. Let us look forward.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Well said. Let us look forward.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.

string.last_approved_text: Your opinions are always deftly delivered.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your opinions are always deftly delivered.

string.last_approved_text: You may well be correct, let us see.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You may well be correct, let us see.

string.last_approved_text: Let those words carry us to victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let those words carry us to victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Such talk is to be expected from you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Must you continue to waste air with such talk?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When you speak, I groan. To business!

string.last_approved_text: What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: That is certainly an opinion.

string.last_approved_text: They are ready, why aren't you?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are ready, why aren't you?

string.last_approved_text: I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak with honour, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we should die, at least we die together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Brother, today we fight for all of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The fates will turn, and victory will be mine!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I grant you the chance to regain your honour.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now you shall fall, fiend!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your foul campaign ends here!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Very well; Guan Yu will give you another thrashing!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You feel battle will be kinder this time? Hah, unlikely.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Try again, if you like. Prepare for disappointment!

string.last_approved_text: I am war incarnate; why do you persist so!?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am war incarnate; why do you persist so!?

string.last_approved_text: As I look at what has befallen my country, I believe it is time I took up arms against those that wound her. Behold me, enemies of China, for in me you will face an unstoppable foe. You face Guan Yu, God of War! You face your doom!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As I look at what has befallen my country, I believe it is time I took up arms against those that wound her. Behold me, enemies of China, for in me you will face an unstoppable foe. You face Guan Yu, God of War! You face your doom!

string.last_approved_text: Am I best suited here? We shall see…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Am I best suited here? We shall see…

string.last_approved_text: Do we still fight for justice? Prove it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do we still fight for justice? Prove it!

string.last_approved_text: My loyalty is earned; it cannot be taken!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My loyalty is earned; it cannot be taken!

string.last_approved_text: My sword is sure, but my mind wavers…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My sword is sure, but my mind wavers…

string.last_approved_text: Our cause has need of victory; I will provide.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause has need of victory; I will provide.

string.last_approved_text: It is time to bring glory to our cause!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to bring glory to our cause!

string.last_approved_text: My loyalty is unwavering, as is my blade!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My loyalty is unwavering, as is my blade!

string.last_approved_text: Our goals are noble - truly worth fighting for!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our goals are noble - truly worth fighting for!

string.last_approved_text: You face Guan Yu, Lord of War!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You face Guan Yu, Lord of War!

string.last_approved_text: Battle approaches! The Tiger roars!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Battle approaches! The Tiger roars!

string.last_approved_text: Leave this to me; I will bring us victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Leave this to me; I will bring us victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, friends. We have much to do!

string.last_approved_text: All traitors will face my blade!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All traitors will face my blade!

string.last_approved_text: Guan Yu does not tolerate treason!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Guan Yu does not tolerate treason!

string.last_approved_text: Come, cowards! Your crimes are answerable to me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, cowards! Your crimes are answerable to me!

string.last_approved_text: You black-hearted wretch! I will cut you down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You black-hearted wretch! I will cut you down!

string.last_approved_text: This is not honourable work, so let us be quick about it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is not honourable work, so let us be quick about it.

string.last_approved_text: I do not have time for this petty work, but I suppose it must be done…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not have time for this petty work, but I suppose it must be done…

string.last_approved_text: War is an ugly business; not all battles lead to epic tales of heroism…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: War is an ugly business; not all battles lead to epic tales of heroism…

string.last_approved_text: A trifling matter, but one that must be dealt with I suppose…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A trifling matter, but one that must be dealt with I suppose…

string.last_approved_text: Now we must do our part! Let us go!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now we must do our part! Let us go!

string.last_approved_text: Now! Bring honour to yourself, and death to your enemies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now! Bring honour to yourself, and death to your enemies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: War comes, it will not wait; rise to meet it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The enemy is waiting; let us not loiter!

string.last_approved_text: Time to fight; traitors simply cannot wait to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Time to fight; traitors simply cannot wait to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I hunger for justice, and this traitor's life!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring me that which I desire - their treasonous head!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough! Cowardly dog! I am coming for you!

string.last_approved_text: How has it come to this? How ignoble…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How has it come to this? How ignoble…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A cornered tiger should never be underestimated.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall roar, once more, and they shall know my rage.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will not die here. This journey will NOT end!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have come this far! We cannot fail here!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not consider defeat, it is NOT an option!

string.last_approved_text: I am heartened by your words, friend. To battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am heartened by your words, friend. To battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are here to fight with me; that is enough!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We can overcome any obstacle, friend. I believe that!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They cannot face our might and survive.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall fight without you; do not bother me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not care about you. Do not talk.

string.last_approved_text: If you die, I will be glad.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If you survive, I will be surprised. And saddened.

string.last_approved_text: Come now; the Lord of War will guide you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come now; the Lord of War will guide you!

string.last_approved_text: Speak well, and fight true. That is all I ask.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Speak well, and fight true. That is all I ask.

string.last_approved_text: Bring your fury, and I will do the rest!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring your fury, and I will do the rest!

string.last_approved_text: Lead the men well, and we will see victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Lead the men well, and we will see victory!

string.last_approved_text: Glory will come to us, if we fight for it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Glory will come to us, if we fight for it!

string.last_approved_text: Never waver - forward is the only way to victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Never waver - forward is the only way to victory.

string.last_approved_text: Yes, yes! Now come, we must crush our enemies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, yes! Now come, we must crush our enemies!

string.last_approved_text: War does not wait for talk! We must fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: War does not wait for talk! We must fight!

string.last_approved_text: Nothing but empty words! Prove your worth!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Nothing but empty words! Prove your worth!

string.last_approved_text: Insufferable oaf! I have no time for you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Insufferable oaf! I have no time for you!

string.last_approved_text: Turn your useless words into action, fool!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Turn your useless words into action, fool!

string.last_approved_text: Cease your dull chatter! The enemy stands before us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Cease your dull chatter! The enemy stands before us!

string.last_approved_text: You cannot match my strength. Good luck!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot match my strength. Good luck!

string.last_approved_text: Fight with all your might. You may even do well!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fight with all your might. You may even do well!

string.last_approved_text: Can you fight with even HALF my strength? Hah!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Can you fight with even HALF my strength? Hah!

string.last_approved_text: I shall wait for you, don't rush!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall wait for you, don't rush!

string.last_approved_text: Do not strain yourself in the melee, friend!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not strain yourself in the melee, friend!

string.last_approved_text: Proud words! Together, our strength will be boundless!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Proud words! Together, our strength will be boundless!

string.last_approved_text: Yes, brother! It is time to do great deeds!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, brother! It is time to do great deeds!

string.last_approved_text: Brother, I shall follow you to whatever end.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Brother, I shall follow you to whatever end.

string.last_approved_text: Well put! To fight alongside you is honour enough.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Well put! To fight alongside you is honour enough.

string.last_approved_text: My sworn kin - today we will do great things!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My sworn kin - today we will do great things!

string.last_approved_text: China is waiting for our victory! Let us go!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China is waiting for our victory! Let us go!

string.last_approved_text: Do not disappoint me, friend! Bring us glory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not disappoint me, friend! Bring us glory!

string.last_approved_text: Together, we cannot possibly lose. I am sure of it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, we cannot possibly lose. I am sure of it!

string.last_approved_text: Yes, sister! It is time to do great deeds!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, sister! It is time to do great deeds!

string.last_approved_text: Sister, I shall follow you to whatever end.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Sister, I shall follow you to whatever end.

string.last_approved_text: You are traitors to China! I shall cut you down.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are traitors to China! I shall cut you down.

string.last_approved_text: There is no place for you here. None!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no place for you here. None!

string.last_approved_text: Silence! Prepare to die for your treason!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Silence! Prepare to die for your treason!

string.last_approved_text: Honeyed words, for a coward!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Honeyed words, for a coward!

string.last_approved_text: We must stay strong like the unbending branches!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must stay strong like the unbending branches!

string.last_approved_text: Do not yield, even as the world crumbles!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not yield, even as the world crumbles!

string.last_approved_text: May we be the mighty branch; they the falling leaves.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: May we be the mighty branch; they the falling leaves.

string.last_approved_text: Stand firm amidst the howling winds! We shall prevail!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stand firm amidst the howling winds! We shall prevail!

string.last_approved_text: Does not the birth of nature spur you to victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Does not the birth of nature spur you to victory!

string.last_approved_text: Great deeds are born with the world; onwards!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Great deeds are born with the world; onwards!

string.last_approved_text: Victory awaits amongst the blossoms!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory awaits amongst the blossoms!

string.last_approved_text: The world wakes, friends, and so must we!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The world wakes, friends, and so must we!

string.last_approved_text: Let us burn bright like the summer sun!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us burn bright like the summer sun!

string.last_approved_text: What is heat but an inconvenience? Press on!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What is heat but an inconvenience? Press on!

string.last_approved_text: Do not slow down, do not relent!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not slow down, do not relent!

string.last_approved_text: We can rest in the shade when this is over.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We can rest in the shade when this is over.

string.last_approved_text: Winter is a fury all its own. Cold, and bitter.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Winter is a fury all its own. Cold, and bitter.

string.last_approved_text: Let not the darkening skies dishearten you, friends!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let not the darkening skies dishearten you, friends!

string.last_approved_text: Come, fury! Heat this wearying world!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, fury! Heat this wearying world!

string.last_approved_text: Though our bodies freeze, our souls burn with fury!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though our bodies freeze, our souls burn with fury!

string.last_approved_text: Our enemies are weak; discordant. This is our advantage!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our enemies are weak; discordant. This is our advantage!

string.last_approved_text: You have abused the people for too long! No more!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have abused the people for too long! No more!

string.last_approved_text: The persecution of China ends here!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The persecution of China ends here!

string.last_approved_text: Your rule is corrupt and destitute! It must end!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your rule is corrupt and destitute! It must end!

string.last_approved_text: Only through brute strength do you survive. Bah!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Only through brute strength do you survive. Bah!

string.last_approved_text: Numbers will not avail you! We have truth!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Numbers will not avail you! We have truth!

string.last_approved_text: Our integrity and just cause will overpower their allies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our integrity and just cause will overpower their allies.

string.last_approved_text: No amount of aid can save your corrupt regime!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No amount of aid can save your corrupt regime!

string.last_approved_text: All of China rises up against this cruelty!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All of China rises up against this cruelty!

string.last_approved_text: Do you see? Together, we are strong!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do you see? Together, we are strong!

string.last_approved_text: United in our endeavour, we shall be unstoppable!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: United in our endeavour, we shall be unstoppable!

string.last_approved_text: Together with our allies, we shall cast off these chains!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together with our allies, we shall cast off these chains!

string.last_approved_text: This city belongs to the people! The enemy cannot have it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This city belongs to the people! The enemy cannot have it!

string.last_approved_text: Throw them back! Their tyranny is not wanted here!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Throw them back! Their tyranny is not wanted here!

string.last_approved_text: Damn them! This is our city! Our home!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Damn them! This is our city! Our home!

string.last_approved_text: Give them only death, and justice!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Give them only death, and justice!

string.last_approved_text: Enough! I am past patiently waiting! China rises!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough! I am past patiently waiting! China rises!

string.last_approved_text: Talk less! Fight more.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Talk less! Fight more.

string.last_approved_text: No more talk! Our liberty cannot wait!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No more talk! Our liberty cannot wait!

string.last_approved_text: Only your death will suffice! Prepare yourselves!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Only your death will suffice! Prepare yourselves!

string.last_approved_text: Their deaths here bring us closer to liberation!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their deaths here bring us closer to liberation!

string.last_approved_text: Can you feel it, comrades? Their end approaches!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Can you feel it, comrades? Their end approaches!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is it! One more push, and they fall!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Here they burn! And from their ashes, we shall rise!

string.last_approved_text: They have brought so many. They cannot stop us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They have brought so many. They cannot stop us!

string.last_approved_text: This victory will bring us one step closer to liberty…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This victory will bring us one step closer to liberty…

string.last_approved_text: This battle is our opportunity. Freedom awaits!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This battle is our opportunity. Freedom awaits!

string.last_approved_text: Liberation lies beyond this battle, my friends!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Liberation lies beyond this battle, my friends!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!

string.last_approved_text: We must crush these insects!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must crush these insects!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to grind these peasants into dust!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A band of brigands before us - nothing more!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not fret, allies come to aid us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You all talk too much! Fight me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we crush them here, they shall never return!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Claim victory, and they will be exposed!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory here will leave them defenceless!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must crush them here, then claim their world.

string.last_approved_text: I am here to correct my past dishonours!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am here to correct my past dishonours!

string.last_approved_text: You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!

string.last_approved_text: Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!

string.last_approved_text: Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This will be no different to the last time.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have duelled this one before, yet they return..

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My friend, how has it come to this?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must still fight, despite our bond.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Long have I waited for this moment…

string.last_approved_text: It is time we finally settled the score…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time we finally settled the score…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!

string.last_approved_text: Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is still fury in the setting sun…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Here we begin; let us fight to the end.

string.last_approved_text: It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!

string.last_approved_text: You are a cretin; your presence offends me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a cretin; your presence offends me.

string.last_approved_text: What right have you to speak to me? Silence!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What right have you to speak to me? Silence!

string.last_approved_text: You speak, but I hear only deception.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak, but I hear only deception.

string.last_approved_text: You spew nothing but bile; be silent.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You spew nothing but bile; be silent.

string.last_approved_text: You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.

string.last_approved_text: Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.

string.last_approved_text: I am done with your words... done with YOU.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am done with your words... done with YOU.

string.last_approved_text: Well said. Let us look forward.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Well said. Let us look forward.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.

string.last_approved_text: Indeed, fine words my friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak true.

string.last_approved_text: Your opinions are always deftly delivered.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your opinions are always deftly delivered.

string.last_approved_text: You may well be correct, let us see.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You may well be correct, let us see.

string.last_approved_text: Let those words carry us to victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let those words carry us to victory.

string.last_approved_text: Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.

string.last_approved_text: Such talk is to be expected from you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Such talk is to be expected from you!

string.last_approved_text: Must you continue to waste air with such talk?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Must you continue to waste air with such talk?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When you speak, I groan. To business!

string.last_approved_text: What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?

string.last_approved_text: Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.

string.last_approved_text: That is certainly an opinion.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: That is certainly an opinion.

string.last_approved_text: They are ready, why aren't you?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are ready, why aren't you?

string.last_approved_text: I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.

string.last_approved_text: You speak with honour, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak with honour, brother.

string.last_approved_text: If we should die, at least we die together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we should die, at least we die together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Brother, today we fight for all of China!

string.last_approved_text: Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!

string.last_approved_text: So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to die, traitor.

string.last_approved_text: Enough talk. You are not long for this world.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.

string.last_approved_text: The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!

string.last_approved_text: May the moon bless the coming battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: May the moon bless the coming battle!

string.last_approved_text: When battle is done, we will feast!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When battle is done, we will feast!

string.last_approved_text: Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!

string.last_approved_text: Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!

string.last_approved_text: Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!

string.last_approved_text: The air is fresh - it smells of victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The air is fresh - it smells of victory!

string.last_approved_text: The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!

string.last_approved_text: Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…

string.last_approved_text: Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.

string.last_approved_text: Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!

string.last_approved_text: Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.

string.last_approved_text: Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.

string.last_approved_text: The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.

string.last_approved_text: Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: I will reclaim my honour.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will reclaim my honour.

string.last_approved_text: You cannot defeat my purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot defeat my purpose.

string.last_approved_text: My body may weaken, but never my resolve!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My body may weaken, but never my resolve!

string.last_approved_text: I shall make amends. You shall taste defeat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall make amends. You shall taste defeat!

string.last_approved_text: You cannot prevail, no matter how you try!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot prevail, no matter how you try!

string.last_approved_text: Very well. Try again. But you will fail.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Very well. Try again. But you will fail.

string.last_approved_text: Your zeal is admirable, but ultimately foolish.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your zeal is admirable, but ultimately foolish.

string.last_approved_text: I have justice on my side. You cannot overcome that.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have justice on my side. You cannot overcome that.

string.last_approved_text: The rebellion is bigger than us both, friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The rebellion is bigger than us both, friend.

string.last_approved_text: I cannot compromise, friend. I am sorry.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I cannot compromise, friend. I am sorry.

string.last_approved_text: China must be free. Why do you oppose that?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China must be free. Why do you oppose that?

string.last_approved_text: We are set upon our paths. So be it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We are set upon our paths. So be it.

string.last_approved_text: I relish the chance to take my sword to you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I relish the chance to take my sword to you!

string.last_approved_text: My vengeance is all of China's!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My vengeance is all of China's!

string.last_approved_text: We will rebuild China atop your broken body!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We will rebuild China atop your broken body!

string.last_approved_text: Now see the might of the downtrodden!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now see the might of the downtrodden!

string.last_approved_text: Through defeating you, we will be free.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Through defeating you, we will be free.

string.last_approved_text: Again and again, we must clash.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Again and again, we must clash.

string.last_approved_text: Until we are free, we will fight you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Until we are free, we will fight you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our blades will not dull. Not ever.

string.last_approved_text: The revolution will endure, no matter the outcome on the battlefield!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The revolution will endure, no matter the outcome on the battlefield!

string.last_approved_text: Blood spilt will be repaid tenfold!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Blood spilt will be repaid tenfold!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You will drown in the blood you have drawn from us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: One lost battle does make a war!

string.last_approved_text: All who oppose our liberation must be crushed!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All who oppose our liberation must be crushed!

string.last_approved_text: These faces are unfamiliar, yet still they bring war…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These faces are unfamiliar, yet still they bring war…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Must every new face be that of an enemy?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Whoever you are, you cannot stop us!

string.last_approved_text: Our spirits are weary, but we cannot give up.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our spirits are weary, but we cannot give up.

string.last_approved_text: The revolution does not die at the strike of a sword.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The revolution does not die at the strike of a sword.

string.last_approved_text: Though they try, ideas do not die so easily.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though they try, ideas do not die so easily.

string.last_approved_text: We cannot give up. Ever. Freedom or death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We cannot give up. Ever. Freedom or death.

string.last_approved_text: The wave of revolution cannot be stopped!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The wave of revolution cannot be stopped!

string.last_approved_text: We are carried aloft by revolutionary zeal!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We are carried aloft by revolutionary zeal!

string.last_approved_text: The times have changed! You cannot stop this!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The times have changed! You cannot stop this!

string.last_approved_text: Your world is done! Time and again we prove this!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your world is done! Time and again we prove this!

string.last_approved_text: So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: The people cry out for freedom, for justice! Do you hear them? Their shouts can be heard from every corner of China, and they will not be ignored! I dream of a country without the oppression of uncaring noblemen! I fight for this noble cause. and I will never relent!

I dream of a country without the oppression of uncaring noblemen! I fight for this noble cause. and I will never relent!

string.last_approved_text: I wonder sometimes what it is we fight for…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I wonder sometimes what it is we fight for…

string.last_approved_text: There is discordance here. It unsettles me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is discordance here. It unsettles me.

string.last_approved_text: Disharmony is a portend to defeat…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Disharmony is a portend to defeat…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause feels clouded... obscured. We must find purpose.

string.last_approved_text: They fear our rising momentum! This is good!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They fear our rising momentum! This is good!

string.last_approved_text: Our ideals are one. Harmonious. We can achieve much.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our ideals are one. Harmonious. We can achieve much.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Through unity and introspection, we shall see victory.

string.last_approved_text: Our cause is just. We shall overthrow these despots!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause is just. We shall overthrow these despots!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: By our deeds, there will be prosperity under heaven!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must throw off the oppressors' chains!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Too long have we languished under the injustices of the nobility!

string.last_approved_text: The Azure Sky is dead! The Yellow Sky will rise!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The Azure Sky is dead! The Yellow Sky will rise!

string.last_approved_text: Hated foe! You are the enemy of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hated foe! You are the enemy of China!

string.last_approved_text: This coward is a traitor to his people!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This coward is a traitor to his people!

string.last_approved_text: The tide of rebellion will wash you away, turncoat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your treachery cannot stand against the revolution!

string.last_approved_text: This coward is a traitor to her people!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This coward is a traitor to her people!

string.last_approved_text: This is not noble work, but it is necessary all the same. See it done.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is not noble work, but it is necessary all the same. See it done.

string.last_approved_text: Know that what you today, you do for a better tomorrow.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Know that what you today, you do for a better tomorrow.

string.last_approved_text: Sweep them away, and do not think of the cost.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Sweep them away, and do not think of the cost.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ever onwards, friends. Eyes forward. Once this is done, we may rest a while.

string.last_approved_text: It is freedom or death, friends. Onwards!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is freedom or death, friends. Onwards!

string.last_approved_text: Hold your heads high, and fight for liberty!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hold your heads high, and fight for liberty!

string.last_approved_text: Today we fight. Today we are free!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today we fight. Today we are free!

string.last_approved_text: Come, to battle! We will not be slaves again!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, to battle! We will not be slaves again!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now let us destroy our most hated oppressors!

string.last_approved_text: No more! Cut these honourless dogs down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No more! Cut these honourless dogs down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must survive. Our revolution must survive!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is it. We cannot waste this chance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Commit our all. Never give up! Liberty or death!

string.last_approved_text: If we lose our momentum, we are done. Fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we lose our momentum, we are done. Fight!

string.last_approved_text: Together, my friend, we will liberate China.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, my friend, we will liberate China.

string.last_approved_text: Can you smell it in the air, friend? Revolution!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Can you smell it in the air, friend? Revolution!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Unity is strength. Strength against oppression!

string.last_approved_text: Through our unity, friend, we will seize freedom!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Through our unity, friend, we will seize freedom!

string.last_approved_text: Liberation through unity. Our unity.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Liberation through unity. Our unity.

string.last_approved_text: China will be free when it is united, as we are.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China will be free when it is united, as we are.

string.last_approved_text: Together we will overthrow the corrupt!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together we will overthrow the corrupt!

string.last_approved_text: You corrupt our vision, yet you fight well. Bah.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You corrupt our vision, yet you fight well. Bah.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You bring disharmony. I pray you aid our cause.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Vile words from a vile cur. Be silent and fight.

string.last_approved_text: Either commit to the cause, or die.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Either commit to the cause, or die.

string.last_approved_text: I have no time for the unjust and unworthy.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have no time for the unjust and unworthy.

string.last_approved_text: Bring victory for the cause, or be gone.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring victory for the cause, or be gone.

string.last_approved_text: Speak no more; your words are impure.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Speak no more; your words are impure.

string.last_approved_text: I cannot stand your wasteful words. Be silent.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I cannot stand your wasteful words. Be silent.

string.last_approved_text: Stay true to the cause, and victory will come.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stay true to the cause, and victory will come.

string.last_approved_text: With earnest hearts and righteous fury, we march!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: With earnest hearts and righteous fury, we march!

string.last_approved_text: This is the war for all of China! We will be victorious!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is the war for all of China! We will be victorious!

string.last_approved_text: Today, our freedom hangs in the balance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today, our freedom hangs in the balance!

string.last_approved_text: Let us see victory for us and for all of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us see victory for us and for all of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is us or them! No surrender!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we fail, we will surely die with China.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The cause is everything. Freedom or death!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are not the leader the people deserve.

string.last_approved_text: Are you really any better than our hated foes?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you really any better than our hated foes?

string.last_approved_text: Do you fight for China? Or just yourself?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do you fight for China? Or just yourself?

string.last_approved_text: Prove to me, brigand, that your intentions are honourable!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Prove to me, brigand, that your intentions are honourable!

string.last_approved_text: We shall see who is more dedicated to our cause!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We shall see who is more dedicated to our cause!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall not falter before a challenge, you shall see!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have endured much, brother, for our cause.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, we will free the people!
