loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stop. Listen. Think. A moment of tranquillity…

string.last_approved_text: A new season rises, and with it our revolution!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A new season rises, and with it our revolution!

string.last_approved_text: A new China blossoms, friends. Let us see it through.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A new China blossoms, friends. Let us see it through.

string.last_approved_text: This new season is ours, if we can but seize it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This new season is ours, if we can but seize it!

string.last_approved_text: Rebellion buds, bursting forth with the coming of spring.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Rebellion buds, bursting forth with the coming of spring.

string.last_approved_text: Our spirits burn like the summer sun!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our spirits burn like the summer sun!

string.last_approved_text: Look how they falter, withering beneath the heat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Look how they falter, withering beneath the heat!

string.last_approved_text: Our fury will burn them to cinders!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our fury will burn them to cinders!

string.last_approved_text: Let our revolution catch fire, burning them away!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let our revolution catch fire, burning them away!

string.last_approved_text: Let not the biting winds dampen your zeal!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let not the biting winds dampen your zeal!

string.last_approved_text: Never relent, even as winter slows your bones.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Never relent, even as winter slows your bones.

string.last_approved_text: From spring to winter. All is one.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: From spring to winter. All is one.

string.last_approved_text: Nature shifts, but our vision must be singular, unyielding.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Nature shifts, but our vision must be singular, unyielding.

string.last_approved_text: When the sun rises, all before it are blinded.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When the sun rises, all before it are blinded.

string.last_approved_text: No foe can stand against my ferocity.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No foe can stand against my ferocity.

string.last_approved_text: Their loyalty will cost them their lives.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their loyalty will cost them their lives.

string.last_approved_text: It is time to draw swords against these witless fools!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to draw swords against these witless fools!

string.last_approved_text: Foul collaborators. They shall all suffer!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Foul collaborators. They shall all suffer!

string.last_approved_text: All enemies must be put to the sword.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All enemies must be put to the sword.

string.last_approved_text: They and their accomplices will face death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They and their accomplices will face death.

string.last_approved_text: Even their combined numbers are not enough. Never enough!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Even their combined numbers are not enough. Never enough!

string.last_approved_text: Loyal allies, welcome. Show me your strength!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Loyal allies, welcome. Show me your strength!

string.last_approved_text: Be fierce, allies, be proud. We shall show them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be fierce, allies, be proud. We shall show them!

string.last_approved_text: They will fall before our combined fury.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will fall before our combined fury.

string.last_approved_text: Our loyal alliance will overwhelm their petty armies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our loyal alliance will overwhelm their petty armies.

string.last_approved_text: They think to take this place? Think again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They think to take this place? Think again.

string.last_approved_text: We have homes here. Lives. They must be repelled.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have homes here. Lives. They must be repelled.

string.last_approved_text: They are brazen to come here. And foolish.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are brazen to come here. And foolish.

string.last_approved_text: They will face my fury for their insolence!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will face my fury for their insolence!

string.last_approved_text: Do you always talk this much? It is exhausting!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do you always talk this much? It is exhausting!

string.last_approved_text: Is battle to be joined? I have other things to do…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Is battle to be joined? I have other things to do…

string.last_approved_text: Quaint! Lovely words, lovely. Are they enough though?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Quaint! Lovely words, lovely. Are they enough though?

string.last_approved_text: One day, I am sure, this battle will begin…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: One day, I am sure, this battle will begin…

string.last_approved_text: I sense the killing strike is at hand!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I sense the killing strike is at hand!

string.last_approved_text: Come, my friends, let us finish them off!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, my friends, let us finish them off!

string.last_approved_text: Let us be brave, bold, and unrelentingly lethal!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us be brave, bold, and unrelentingly lethal!

string.last_approved_text: It is time their story drew to a sharp end.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time their story drew to a sharp end.

string.last_approved_text: Show them ferocity, and they shall be broken forever.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Show them ferocity, and they shall be broken forever.

string.last_approved_text: Victory today will shatter their spirit and their strength.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory today will shatter their spirit and their strength.

string.last_approved_text: Tear them apart, leave nothing for them to salvage!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Tear them apart, leave nothing for them to salvage!

string.last_approved_text: Today, we will break these fools beyond repair!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today, we will break these fools beyond repair!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: I will not be upstaged by YOU. Fight me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will not be upstaged by YOU. Fight me!

string.last_approved_text: You cannot slow me down. Nobody can.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot slow me down. Nobody can.

string.last_approved_text: You will regret ever crossing me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You will regret ever crossing me.

string.last_approved_text: There is no fury like wounded pride. You will see…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no fury like wounded pride. You will see…

string.last_approved_text: I understand, your pride is wounded. Come, try again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I understand, your pride is wounded. Come, try again.

string.last_approved_text: What makes you think you can win NOW?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What makes you think you can win NOW?

string.last_approved_text: You cannot overcome my ferocity. Why even try?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot overcome my ferocity. Why even try?

string.last_approved_text: You wish to regain lost glory? So be it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You wish to regain lost glory? So be it.

string.last_approved_text: Our friendship, as it was, is over. I'm sorry.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our friendship, as it was, is over. I'm sorry.

string.last_approved_text: I cannot look back, friend. Only ruin lies behind.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I cannot look back, friend. Only ruin lies behind.

string.last_approved_text: I cannot show mercy, friend. Mercy is defeat.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I cannot show mercy, friend. Mercy is defeat.

string.last_approved_text: Though we walk different paths, they have led us here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though we walk different paths, they have led us here.

string.last_approved_text: Seldom do these chances come along. I shall relish it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Seldom do these chances come along. I shall relish it.

string.last_approved_text: The opportunity to exact justice on you. Come!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The opportunity to exact justice on you. Come!

string.last_approved_text: Killing you will be a singular pleasure.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Killing you will be a singular pleasure.

string.last_approved_text: It is time, at last, for you to fall.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time, at last, for you to fall.

string.last_approved_text: Old adversaries make for interesting battles.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Old adversaries make for interesting battles.

string.last_approved_text: Perennial enemy, we meet again!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Perennial enemy, we meet again!

string.last_approved_text: I do enjoy our regular battles!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do enjoy our regular battles!

string.last_approved_text: You again? Oh, very well, I suppose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You again? Oh, very well, I suppose.

string.last_approved_text: Defeat cannot slow me. I will have victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Defeat cannot slow me. I will have victory.

string.last_approved_text: I am the stronger for my defeat.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am the stronger for my defeat.

string.last_approved_text: We clash again. This time will be different.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We clash again. This time will be different.

string.last_approved_text: Defeat is our past. Victory is our future!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Defeat is our past. Victory is our future!

string.last_approved_text: I, for one, shall forget these fresh faces.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I, for one, shall forget these fresh faces.

string.last_approved_text: These new ones should fear me. Soon, they will.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These new ones should fear me. Soon, they will.

string.last_approved_text: How naive they must be, to not know their end approaches.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How naive they must be, to not know their end approaches.

string.last_approved_text: Old foe or new, all will face destruction.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Old foe or new, all will face destruction.

string.last_approved_text: My spirit cannot be dimmed by you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My spirit cannot be dimmed by you.

string.last_approved_text: I will overcome these challenges, as I always have.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will overcome these challenges, as I always have.

string.last_approved_text: Fate can be cruel, but I can be far, FAR more cruel!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fate can be cruel, but I can be far, FAR more cruel!

string.last_approved_text: The wheel of fate will turn. Victory comes. Be patient…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The wheel of fate will turn. Victory comes. Be patient…

string.last_approved_text: I am beyond your power. You cannot stop me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am beyond your power. You cannot stop me.

string.last_approved_text: The Rising Sun burns all before it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The Rising Sun burns all before it.

string.last_approved_text: You cannot hope to stop me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot hope to stop me.

string.last_approved_text: Failure is your fate. Again and again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Failure is your fate. Again and again.

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: If China is to be unified, it is not the likes of Dong Zhuo who will bring lasting peace. No, dogs like him must be hunted down and destroyed. China has no need of brutal warmongers - cast them into the fires of history!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If China is to be unified, it is not the likes of Dong Zhuo who will bring lasting peace. No, dogs like him must be hunted down and destroyed. China has no need of brutal warmongers - cast them into the fires of history!

string.last_approved_text: My ire is legendary. Do not provoke it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My ire is legendary. Do not provoke it.

string.last_approved_text: Do not take my blade for granted.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not take my blade for granted.

string.last_approved_text: I am loyal only to those who deserve it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am loyal only to those who deserve it.

string.last_approved_text: Loyalty is earned, through toil and blood.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Loyalty is earned, through toil and blood.

string.last_approved_text: Our cause is just. We shall see it through.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause is just. We shall see it through.

string.last_approved_text: A righteous war must be fiercely fought!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A righteous war must be fiercely fought!

string.last_approved_text: Hold fast, for our cause is worth the effort!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hold fast, for our cause is worth the effort!

string.last_approved_text: Our cause is worth the effort; the determined effort!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause is worth the effort; the determined effort!

string.last_approved_text: I will not flinch; my resolve is unwavering!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will not flinch; my resolve is unwavering!

string.last_approved_text: Without family, what else is worth fighting for?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Without family, what else is worth fighting for?

string.last_approved_text: I am fire. I am fury. I am the Sun!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am fire. I am fury. I am the Sun!

string.last_approved_text: You cannot stop me once my mind is set.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cannot stop me once my mind is set.

string.last_approved_text: To cross me is to invite your own destruction.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: To cross me is to invite your own destruction.

string.last_approved_text: Traitor! You ask for death, and I shall oblige.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Traitor! You ask for death, and I shall oblige.

string.last_approved_text: The fate of a traitor is total oblivion.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The fate of a traitor is total oblivion.

string.last_approved_text: I will strike you down myself, traitor!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will strike you down myself, traitor!

string.last_approved_text: Be fierce. Do not relent, even though this is menial work.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be fierce. Do not relent, even though this is menial work.

string.last_approved_text: It is just that these enemies may die, even though they never stood a chance.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is just that these enemies may die, even though they never stood a chance.

string.last_approved_text: Though this may seem unfair, know you are working to a higher purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though this may seem unfair, know you are working to a higher purpose.

string.last_approved_text: Show your loyalty and clear the path. Rough work, certainly, but it is required.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Show your loyalty and clear the path. Rough work, certainly, but it is required.

string.last_approved_text: Now, fly, like the Vermillion Bird, to victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now, fly, like the Vermillion Bird, to victory!

string.last_approved_text: Do not relent. Be fierce. TAKE victory from them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not relent. Be fierce. TAKE victory from them!

string.last_approved_text: Victory is ours to claim, so let us claim it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory is ours to claim, so let us claim it!

string.last_approved_text: Do not fear their pitiful band. Victory is your right!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not fear their pitiful band. Victory is your right!

string.last_approved_text: Know only this; all traitors must die.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Know only this; all traitors must die.

string.last_approved_text: There is no room for treason. Execute them all.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no room for treason. Execute them all.

string.last_approved_text: Fiercely prosecute my word; kill all traitors!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fiercely prosecute my word; kill all traitors!

string.last_approved_text: Loyalty is everything. Treason is despicable. Kill them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Loyalty is everything. Treason is despicable. Kill them!

string.last_approved_text: Ugh! How has it comes to this…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ugh! How has it comes to this…

string.last_approved_text: Fight, because death or servitude lies in defeat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fight, because death or servitude lies in defeat!

string.last_approved_text: All is at stake! Defeat is death!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All is at stake! Defeat is death!

string.last_approved_text: They close in on us. Those savage hounds smell blood…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They close in on us. Those savage hounds smell blood…

string.last_approved_text: Be brave today, for there is no retreat.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be brave today, for there is no retreat.

string.last_approved_text: When this done, we shall have victory or oblivion.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When this done, we shall have victory or oblivion.

string.last_approved_text: There is no turning back, so do not entertain it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no turning back, so do not entertain it!

string.last_approved_text: Fight, knowing that the path behind you is in ruins.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fight, knowing that the path behind you is in ruins.

string.last_approved_text: Your words are comfort. Shall we?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your words are comfort. Shall we?

string.last_approved_text: In dark times, you are a light. Yet battle approaches…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: In dark times, you are a light. Yet battle approaches…

string.last_approved_text: To war, then, with your words as guide.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: To war, then, with your words as guide.

string.last_approved_text: Fierce words, for a fierce heart. Come!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fierce words, for a fierce heart. Come!

string.last_approved_text: I am glad to have you here, friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am glad to have you here, friend.

string.last_approved_text: Battle awaits, friend; let us go!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Battle awaits, friend; let us go!

string.last_approved_text: Be brave, as I know you are. Come!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be brave, as I know you are. Come!

string.last_approved_text: Together, our enemy stands no chance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, our enemy stands no chance!

string.last_approved_text: You are a craven dog, but still, fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a craven dog, but still, fight!

string.last_approved_text: Do the only thing you can, fool - fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do the only thing you can, fool - fight!

string.last_approved_text: Take yourself to battle and out of my sight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Take yourself to battle and out of my sight.

string.last_approved_text: Redeem yourself in my eyes, if you can.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Redeem yourself in my eyes, if you can.

string.last_approved_text: Do not talk. It hurts my ears.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not talk. It hurts my ears.

string.last_approved_text: You are offensive to the senses. Ugh.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are offensive to the senses. Ugh.

string.last_approved_text: Come along; fight now, or die. It matters not.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come along; fight now, or die. It matters not.

string.last_approved_text: If you fall in battle, try to do so with honour.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If you fall in battle, try to do so with honour.

string.last_approved_text: You have had your say, now battle awaits.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have had your say, now battle awaits.

string.last_approved_text: Be bold, and brave, and never surrender.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be bold, and brave, and never surrender.

string.last_approved_text: Victory will be ours, if we hold our nerve.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory will be ours, if we hold our nerve.

string.last_approved_text: I will not see us falter here. You must not either.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: In the name of China, we must win.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Battle approaches, and we cannot back down.

string.last_approved_text: We will look our enemy in the eyes!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We will look our enemy in the eyes!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Why are you here? I do not care for you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you done speaking? Show me some spirit!

string.last_approved_text: Prove you can fight, or are you craven?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Prove you can fight, or are you craven?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be brave, if you are able. If not, leave.

string.last_approved_text: You are to me as family. Together, we shall prevail.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are to me as family. Together, we shall prevail.

string.last_approved_text: Aptly spoken. There is nothing we cannot overcome.

string.last_approved_text: Just so. Now, battle; show your strength!

string.last_approved_text: Show them your strength, and we will win!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Show them your strength, and we will win!

string.last_approved_text: My friend, it is time to teach them a lesson!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My friend, it is time to teach them a lesson!

string.last_approved_text: We shall not soon forget your words, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We shall not soon forget your words, brother.

string.last_approved_text: Bring your fury today, and they shall be crushed.

string.last_approved_text: We shall not soon forget your words, sister.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We shall not soon forget your words, sister.

string.last_approved_text: Be silent. The only response to treason, is death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be silent. The only response to treason, is death.

string.last_approved_text: You will fall because you must. No quarter.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You will fall because you must. No quarter.

string.last_approved_text: There is no mercy for traitors. None at all.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no mercy for traitors. None at all.

string.last_approved_text: To stand against China is to invite death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: To stand against China is to invite death.

string.last_approved_text: Let the autumn come. We fight beneath the moon's gaze.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let the autumn come. We fight beneath the moon's gaze.

string.last_approved_text: Bai Hu roars from the west; autumn is come!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bai Hu roars from the west; autumn is come!

string.last_approved_text: Do not fear the change of nature. Fear only me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not fear the change of nature. Fear only me.

string.last_approved_text: The air turns… the White Tiger prowls for prey…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The air turns… the White Tiger prowls for prey…

string.last_approved_text: Spring is slow to start. I will be swift!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Spring is slow to start. I will be swift!

string.last_approved_text: Let this be the last spring they ever see!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let this be the last spring they ever see!

string.last_approved_text: The sun rises once more. Another battle awaits!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The sun rises once more. Another battle awaits!

string.last_approved_text: Ah, spring! The Azure Dragon rises in the east!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ah, spring! The Azure Dragon rises in the east!

string.last_approved_text: I am the sun. I shall incinerate my enemies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am the sun. I shall incinerate my enemies.

string.last_approved_text: My foes shall burn before me!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My foes shall burn before me!

string.last_approved_text: Zhu Que rises in the south; summer burns!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Zhu Que rises in the south; summer burns!

string.last_approved_text: Be as the sun; furious and just.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be as the sun; furious and just.

string.last_approved_text: May Xuanwu guide us through this frigid season…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: May Xuanwu guide us through this frigid season…

string.last_approved_text: As the world freezes, we must still fight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As the world freezes, we must still fight.

string.last_approved_text: Be fierce as the earth hardens. It matters not!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be fierce as the earth hardens. It matters not!

string.last_approved_text: Cold, so cold. May our hearts be colder.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Cold, so cold. May our hearts be colder.

string.last_approved_text: These vagabonds and ruffians must be brought to heel.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These vagabonds and ruffians must be brought to heel.

string.last_approved_text: They are obstructers of justice, every man.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are obstructers of justice, every man.

string.last_approved_text: This is nothing but an obstacle to overcome.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This is nothing but an obstacle to overcome.

string.last_approved_text: All enemies will fall. Order will be restored.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All enemies will fall. Order will be restored.

string.last_approved_text: They have allies? Hmph. So be it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They have allies? Hmph. So be it.

string.last_approved_text: They are strong together. We must be stronger still.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are strong together. We must be stronger still.

string.last_approved_text: They are many, but we are focused. We can win.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are many, but we are focused. We can win.

string.last_approved_text: Numbers mean nothing. Our cause is righteous.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Numbers mean nothing. Our cause is righteous.

string.last_approved_text: Together, we will crush this chaos.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, we will crush this chaos.

string.last_approved_text: With our loyal friends alongside us, we cannot fail.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: With our loyal friends alongside us, we cannot fail.

string.last_approved_text: Yes, friends, let us go forward as one!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, friends, let us go forward as one!

string.last_approved_text: Friends, we are of harmonious purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Friends, we are of harmonious purpose.

string.last_approved_text: Each brick here must be defended.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Each brick here must be defended.

string.last_approved_text: Let us stand as disciplined as these walls.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us stand as disciplined as these walls.

string.last_approved_text: We stand on the foundations of order. Defend it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We stand on the foundations of order. Defend it!

string.last_approved_text: This city cannot fall. Instability will not reign!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This city cannot fall. Instability will not reign!

string.last_approved_text: Silence. Your words bring disharmony. Come; fight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Silence. Your words bring disharmony. Come; fight.

string.last_approved_text: Enough; to battle. You have sown enough discordance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough; to battle. You have sown enough discordance!

string.last_approved_text: You speak well, but words will not avail you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak well, but words will not avail you.

string.last_approved_text: Are you finished? Very well. To battle then.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you finished? Very well. To battle then.

string.last_approved_text: From discord, harmony. Their defeat here will be total.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: From discord, harmony. Their defeat here will be total.

string.last_approved_text: Their destruction will ensure the restoration of order!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their destruction will ensure the restoration of order!

string.last_approved_text: Eradicate them. Let stability resume!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Eradicate them. Let stability resume!

string.last_approved_text: Restore the balance. Crush these usurpers!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Restore the balance. Crush these usurpers!

string.last_approved_text: Extinguish their wavering flame. Crush their spirit.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Extinguish their wavering flame. Crush their spirit.

string.last_approved_text: They are all here; a harmonious convenience.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are all here; a harmonious convenience.

string.last_approved_text: They will be disordered without this force.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will be disordered without this force.

string.last_approved_text: Counterbalance their commitment with righteousness. Destroy them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Counterbalance their commitment with righteousness. Destroy them!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: Heaven and earth will judge us, not these traitors.

string.last_approved_text: The chaos must be purged. We must purge it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The chaos must be purged. We must purge it!

string.last_approved_text: This treachery damages the land. It must be destroyed.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This treachery damages the land. It must be destroyed.

string.last_approved_text: Now is the time to push back the madness.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now is the time to push back the madness.

string.last_approved_text: Darkness encroaches. Forge desperation into resilience. Fight on!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Darkness encroaches. Forge desperation into resilience. Fight on!

string.last_approved_text: Do our dreams die here? We must hold fast!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do our dreams die here? We must hold fast!

string.last_approved_text: Light passes into darkness. Unless we endure.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Light passes into darkness. Unless we endure.

string.last_approved_text: Die here, or fight tomorrow. Only one choice…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Die here, or fight tomorrow. Only one choice…

string.last_approved_text: We weigh much of our strength here. We must win.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We weigh much of our strength here. We must win.

string.last_approved_text: Here, we commit all our energy. Victory is essential.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Here, we commit all our energy. Victory is essential.

string.last_approved_text: Let our mighty force bring harmony, not endless discord.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let our mighty force bring harmony, not endless discord.

string.last_approved_text: Let the strength of this force tip the balance.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let the strength of this force tip the balance.

string.last_approved_text: Your words soothe my soul, friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your words soothe my soul, friend.

string.last_approved_text: When you speak, I find peace.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When you speak, I find peace.

string.last_approved_text: It is well, friend, that you are here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is well, friend, that you are here.

string.last_approved_text: I am glad of your company today.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am glad of your company today.

string.last_approved_text: Together, friend, nothing can stop us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, friend, nothing can stop us.

string.last_approved_text: Opportunity is presented to us, friend. Let us seize it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Opportunity is presented to us, friend. Let us seize it.

string.last_approved_text: No force can stop our united strength!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No force can stop our united strength!

string.last_approved_text: I am grateful you are here to aid us today.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am grateful you are here to aid us today.

string.last_approved_text: I dislike you, greatly, but your skill cannot be denied.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I dislike you, greatly, but your skill cannot be denied.

string.last_approved_text: You bring opportunity, even if you are reprehensible.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You bring opportunity, even if you are reprehensible.

string.last_approved_text: I cannot stand the sight of you. Do your duty.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I cannot stand the sight of you. Do your duty.

string.last_approved_text: You anger me, but I will stay my blade.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You anger me, but I will stay my blade.

string.last_approved_text: You may be disagreeable, but you have skill.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You may be disagreeable, but you have skill.

string.last_approved_text: Quiet your mouth and your mind. Battle awaits.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Quiet your mouth and your mind. Battle awaits.

string.last_approved_text: It is difficult to endure you, but I must. I must…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is difficult to endure you, but I must. I must…

string.last_approved_text: Come. Fight, do not talk. It is… insufferable.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come. Fight, do not talk. It is… insufferable.

string.last_approved_text: It is time we seized this opportunity for greatness.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time we seized this opportunity for greatness.

string.last_approved_text: I am glad of your assistance today, comrade.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am glad of your assistance today, comrade.

string.last_approved_text: Today, there may be greatness for all of us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today, there may be greatness for all of us.

string.last_approved_text: Glory shall await us all, if we are successful.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Glory shall await us all, if we are successful.

string.last_approved_text: Let us see success, and through it, harmony.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us see success, and through it, harmony.

string.last_approved_text: No one man can win this battle. Yet together, we can.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No one man can win this battle. Yet together, we can.

string.last_approved_text: Wars are won by many minds, yet one purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Wars are won by many minds, yet one purpose.

string.last_approved_text: Victory lies in harmony. It lies ahead.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Victory lies in harmony. It lies ahead.

string.last_approved_text: You are a tiresome necessity today.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a tiresome necessity today.

string.last_approved_text: Talk less, fight more. I have need of strength, not bluster.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Talk less, fight more. I have need of strength, not bluster.

string.last_approved_text: You are a cunning warrior, but a noisome pain.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a cunning warrior, but a noisome pain.

string.last_approved_text: You disquiet my mind. Be silent.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You disquiet my mind. Be silent.

string.last_approved_text: Your presence brings disharmony.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your presence brings disharmony.

string.last_approved_text: Do fight your hardest, if you are able.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do fight your hardest, if you are able.

string.last_approved_text: Show me what you have to offer…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Show me what you have to offer…

string.last_approved_text: Let us see what you can do, then.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us see what you can do, then.

string.last_approved_text: Brother, let us go forward as one.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Brother, let us go forward as one.

string.last_approved_text: Harmony in our beliefs, unity in our purpose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Harmony in our beliefs, unity in our purpose.

string.last_approved_text: Let us restore order together, brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us restore order together, brother.

string.last_approved_text: I am proud to call you brother.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am proud to call you brother.

string.last_approved_text: With unified purpose we go forward!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: With unified purpose we go forward!

string.last_approved_text: Let our bond never be broken!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let our bond never be broken!

string.last_approved_text: War cannot break our spirit, nor our kinship!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: War cannot break our spirit, nor our kinship!

string.last_approved_text: If we fight together victory is assured!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we fight together victory is assured!

string.last_approved_text: Sister, let us go forward as one.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Sister, let us go forward as one.

string.last_approved_text: Let us restore order together, sister.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us restore order together, sister.

string.last_approved_text: I am proud to call you sister.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am proud to call you sister.

string.last_approved_text: I am sorry that it must come to this, but it must.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am sorry that it must come to this, but it must.

string.last_approved_text: Traitor, you stand before the executioner.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Traitor, you stand before the executioner.

string.last_approved_text: I must be the sword of justice that slays you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I must be the sword of justice that slays you.

string.last_approved_text: The duty of your penance falls now to me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The duty of your penance falls now to me.

string.last_approved_text: Autumn brings such beautiful decay.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Autumn brings such beautiful decay.

string.last_approved_text: May our purpose burn brightly like autumnal hues.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: May our purpose burn brightly like autumnal hues.

string.last_approved_text: Nature resets its order. So must we.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Nature resets its order. So must we.

string.last_approved_text: The changing of the seasons. Harmony. Balance. Victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The changing of the seasons. Harmony. Balance. Victory.

string.last_approved_text: Death and rebirth. An endless cycle…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Death and rebirth. An endless cycle…

string.last_approved_text: Spring blooms once more. How harmonious.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Spring blooms once more. How harmonious.

string.last_approved_text: There is such poetry in the rebirth of nature.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is such poetry in the rebirth of nature.

string.last_approved_text: We should renew, as spring renews the earth.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We should renew, as spring renews the earth.

string.last_approved_text: It is time for bureaucracy, not war. Let us be swift.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time for bureaucracy, not war. Let us be swift.

string.last_approved_text: Push through the heat to victory. We have a duty.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Push through the heat to victory. We have a duty.

string.last_approved_text: Find peace within, though the body swelters.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Find peace within, though the body swelters.

string.last_approved_text: Find peace beneath the sun, then victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Find peace beneath the sun, then victory.

string.last_approved_text: Nature's death steels cold purpose in my breast.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Nature's death steels cold purpose in my breast.

string.last_approved_text: The world must die, that it may be reborn. Come.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The world must die, that it may be reborn. Come.

string.last_approved_text: Though it is cold, our duty must still be done.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though it is cold, our duty must still be done.

string.last_approved_text: Let purpose drive you through the bitter chill.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let purpose drive you through the bitter chill.

string.last_approved_text: No quarter! I will tear you limb from limb!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No quarter! I will tear you limb from limb!

string.last_approved_text: The savagery of my strikes will rend them asunder!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The savagery of my strikes will rend them asunder!

string.last_approved_text: Ha! They cannot predict where my fury will strike!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ha! They cannot predict where my fury will strike!

string.last_approved_text: They will fall! I am a force of nature!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will fall! I am a force of nature!

string.last_approved_text: Allies pour onto the field? What luck!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Allies pour onto the field? What luck!

string.last_approved_text: With me, allies! I will lead us to glory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: With me, allies! I will lead us to glory!

string.last_approved_text: I am worth a thousand than any of their allies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am worth a thousand than any of their allies!

string.last_approved_text: Allies? Tell them to keep up, if they can!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Allies? Tell them to keep up, if they can!

string.last_approved_text: Cowards and brigands! Hiding behind their allies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Cowards and brigands! Hiding behind their allies.

string.last_approved_text: I will cut through their allies. They cannot run!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will cut through their allies. They cannot run!

string.last_approved_text: They have allies? More for the slaughter, then!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They have allies? More for the slaughter, then!

string.last_approved_text: One, by one, they will all fall!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: One, by one, they will all fall!

string.last_approved_text: I will knock these fools back, one after another!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will knock these fools back, one after another!

string.last_approved_text: Do they not know Lü Bu guards this place? Hah!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do they not know Lü Bu guards this place? Hah!

string.last_approved_text: What do they hope to achieve? Hah. No mercy!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What do they hope to achieve? Hah. No mercy!

string.last_approved_text: They mean to try and take this city? Idiocy!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They mean to try and take this city? Idiocy!

string.last_approved_text: Are you done? I grow impatient.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you done? I grow impatient.

string.last_approved_text: There are other battles to fight, if you don't mind…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There are other battles to fight, if you don't mind…

string.last_approved_text: Silence! I am likely to succumb to old age before this battle ever begins…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Silence! I am likely to succumb to old age before this battle ever begins…

string.last_approved_text: Enough talk! Or are you not in the mood?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough talk! Or are you not in the mood?

string.last_approved_text: None can match me. Their destruction will be testament.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: None can match me. Their destruction will be testament.

string.last_approved_text: Crush them, utterly. We have more work to do.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Crush them, utterly. We have more work to do.

string.last_approved_text: I shall breach these walls and slaughter these holdouts.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall breach these walls and slaughter these holdouts.

string.last_approved_text: With me! It is time history forget these dogs!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: With me! It is time history forget these dogs!

string.last_approved_text: Hah, look. They're lined up, ready for death!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hah, look. They're lined up, ready for death!

string.last_approved_text: They march gladly to their doom!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They march gladly to their doom!

string.last_approved_text: This day we will crush their resistance for good!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This day we will crush their resistance for good!

string.last_approved_text: Today will be a dark day for them…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today will be a dark day for them…
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: You have been lucky thus far. No, father!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have been lucky thus far. No, father!

string.last_approved_text: I will cut you down for DARING to wound me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will cut you down for DARING to wound me.

string.last_approved_text: I shall repay your past kindness a thousandfold.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall repay your past kindness a thousandfold.

string.last_approved_text: Brigand! I challenge you! Fight me once more!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Brigand! I challenge you! Fight me once more!

string.last_approved_text: You wish to fight again? Very well, fool.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You wish to fight again? Very well, fool.

string.last_approved_text: Lü Bu, warrior worth a thousand, will duel you again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Lü Bu, warrior worth a thousand, will duel you again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your determination is noble, but will be fatal.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What friendship we shared dies on the battlefield.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will relish tearing out your verminous heart.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your treacherous path ends with me, rat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to face the end. Time to die!

string.last_approved_text: You cowardly wretch! I shall have your head!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You cowardly wretch! I shall have your head!

string.last_approved_text: Ah, we meet again! To battle, then!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ah, we meet again! To battle, then!

string.last_approved_text: Let us not stand on ceremony? Battle awaits!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us not stand on ceremony? Battle awaits!

string.last_approved_text: You constantly stand in my way. Intolerable!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You constantly stand in my way. Intolerable!

string.last_approved_text: Old adversary, you are tenacious!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Old adversary, you are tenacious!

string.last_approved_text: I hunger for revenge, and I shall have it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I hunger for revenge, and I shall have it!

string.last_approved_text: I will not hesitate. This battle is mine!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will not hesitate. This battle is mine!

string.last_approved_text: You have wounded my pride; I will have vengeance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have wounded my pride; I will have vengeance!

string.last_approved_text: This time, you had better kill me; I will never relent!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This time, you had better kill me; I will never relent!

string.last_approved_text: Their names are irrelevant. Only that they oppose me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their names are irrelevant. Only that they oppose me.

string.last_approved_text: I do not know them, and nor will history.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not know them, and nor will history.

string.last_approved_text: Known or not, I will crush all my enemies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Known or not, I will crush all my enemies.

string.last_approved_text: They know not who they face. Poor, naïve fools…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They know not who they face. Poor, naïve fools…

string.last_approved_text: What tricks do you employ that constantly vex me!?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What tricks do you employ that constantly vex me!?

string.last_approved_text: I vow I will defeat you. I shall!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I vow I will defeat you. I shall!

string.last_approved_text: Most hated enemy! I am coming for you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Most hated enemy! I am coming for you!

string.last_approved_text: You may defeat me a thousand times; I will still fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You may defeat me a thousand times; I will still fight!

string.last_approved_text: That they survived our last encounter is astonishing.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: That they survived our last encounter is astonishing.

string.last_approved_text: I suppose I had better finish the job then.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I suppose I had better finish the job then.

string.last_approved_text: China balances on the tip of a spear - which way will it fall? I honestly care not, so long as the battle is worthy. Are there any who would face my might? Any who CAN!? I have felled a thousand men and will fell a thousand more.

string.last_approved_text: I know two truths: my brother is the rightful emperor, and good governance can come only from unification. Any who deny these truths are my enemy, be they friend, foe or family. In my brother's name, I will march to war, and defend the land.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I know two truths: my brother is the rightful emperor, and good governance can come only from unification. Any who deny these truths are my enemy, be they friend, foe or family. In my brother's name, I will march to war, and defend the land.

string.last_approved_text: The emperor must be defended - this is known. Yet the government must be upheld by those with wisdom and authority; in this way I may yet help. Although my father fell from imperial grace, there is much I can do to restore his name, and prove my own worth!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The emperor must be defended - this is known. Yet the government must be upheld by those with wisdom and authority; in this way I may yet help. Although my father fell from imperial grace, there is much I can do to restore his name, and prove my own worth!

string.last_approved_text: I have seen many summers come and go, and seen much bloodshed in the name of peace, yet never have I seen a family turn on itself so. And now they call for my arrest? I do not wish this war, but I must see these accusations quashed - forever.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have seen many summers come and go, and seen much bloodshed in the name of peace, yet never have I seen a family turn on itself so. And now they call for my arrest? I do not wish this war, but I must see these accusations quashed - forever.

string.last_approved_text: Long have I suffered the slander and scorn of my peers, of my own kin. Now I shall return their good grace. If China is to be ruled by a strong leader, then neither my kin nor the other bickering fools will suffice - it must be me. After so many years, finally, they will see my brilliance.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Long have I suffered the slander and scorn of my peers, of my own kin. Now I shall return their good grace. If China is to be ruled by a strong leader, then neither my kin nor the other bickering fools will suffice - it must be me. After so many years, finally, they will see my brilliance.

string.last_approved_text: The Jin dynasty must be upheld, it must thrive! To that end, I will strike any down who threaten the realm, even my own kin. They bicker and squawk like fools. I shall wait no longer! Time, and my patience, grow short - the time to act is now!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The Jin dynasty must be upheld, it must thrive! To that end, I will strike any down who threaten the realm, even my own kin. They bicker and squawk like fools. I shall wait no longer! Time, and my patience, grow short - the time to act is now!

string.last_approved_text: A dynasty that consumes itself is doomed. We must unite or we will surely be destroyed. The empress has never been a friend to me, yet the Jin must find its common purpose again, united beyond our chosen emperor. Only then will the people once again know who their true rulers are.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A dynasty that consumes itself is doomed. We must unite or we will surely be destroyed. The empress has never been a friend to me, yet the Jin must find its common purpose again, united beyond our chosen emperor. Only then will the people once again know who their true rulers are.

string.last_approved_text: I have no real love for warfare, nor for battling my own kin, but when opportunity beckons, only the fool ignores its call. The emperor is chosen by the divine; this is true. To oppose him is treason, yet there is still power to be gained by standing tall at his side…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have no real love for warfare, nor for battling my own kin, but when opportunity beckons, only the fool ignores its call. The emperor is chosen by the divine; this is true. To oppose him is treason, yet there is still power to be gained by standing tall at his side…

string.last_approved_text: So many of my kin turn not only on one another, but on their emperor too. He is their chosen lord - they must kneel, anything else is treason. If I stand to defend him, and punish his enemies, I will surely be seen as a most capable leader. This is my chance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So many of my kin turn not only on one another, but on their emperor too. He is their chosen lord - they must kneel, anything else is treason. If I stand to defend him, and punish his enemies, I will surely be seen as a most capable leader. This is my chance!

string.last_approved_text: This rabble has no conviction. None!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This rabble has no conviction. None!

string.last_approved_text: I spy cowards in this rout. Many cowards.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I spy cowards in this rout. Many cowards.

string.last_approved_text: These fools are about to meet their end.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These fools are about to meet their end.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The weak of heart have no chance against us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The cowards cannot fight alone, it seems.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their numbers are nothing before the strength of our spirit!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us be bold, together!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do you intend to fight at all!?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do you mean to bore me into defeat? Fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They're brave, truly, but foolish! Break them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their numbers are irrelevant. Destroy them all!
