Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: I sense a chance for vengeance!

string.last_approved_text: Come. We fight! My resolve is unwavering!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Defeat can be a most potent incentive...

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a coward and will die like one!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is beauty in routine, they say..

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fate brings us to battle each other once again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fear no strangers. Fear nothing. Courage! Victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hardship must not slow us. We WILL be victorious.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not let your bravery waver. Fight on!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These foes have strong spirits, but we must overcome them!

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: The wise general is the Lord of Destiny; he holds the nation's peace or peril in his hands! Brave warriors of the south; we hold the fate of China in our hands! We must forge onwards, as China can only know peace through bravery, honour and loyalty!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What nonsense. Still, show loyalty, and we shall succeed!

string.last_approved_text: China demands your destruction. I obey!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China demands your destruction. I obey!

string.last_approved_text: It is time to end these dogs once and for all.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to end these dogs once and for all.

string.last_approved_text: They will break their strength against us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will break their strength against us.

string.last_approved_text: When we are done, their light will be greatly dimmed!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When we are done, their light will be greatly dimmed!

string.last_approved_text: They cannot endure a defeat. So we shall defeat them.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They cannot endure a defeat. So we shall defeat them.

string.last_approved_text: It is time for these overzealous fools to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time for these overzealous fools to die!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: My dignity demands I best you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My dignity demands I best you.

string.last_approved_text: I must reclaim my lost glory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I must reclaim my lost glory.

string.last_approved_text: When I am tarnished, China is tarnished also.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When I am tarnished, China is tarnished also.

string.last_approved_text: I shall wipe away the grime of defeat.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall wipe away the grime of defeat.

string.last_approved_text: Hah, you wish to try again? Very well.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hah, you wish to try again? Very well.

string.last_approved_text: I shall give you another chance to regain your dignity!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall give you another chance to regain your dignity!

string.last_approved_text: I gain nothing from denying a challenge. So be it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I gain nothing from denying a challenge. So be it.

string.last_approved_text: Come now - do not embarrass yourself. Very well.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come now - do not embarrass yourself. Very well.

string.last_approved_text: This war truly has torn us asunder, friend.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This war truly has torn us asunder, friend.

string.last_approved_text: Let us fight like men, and friends, yes?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us fight like men, and friends, yes?

string.last_approved_text: I will battle you with the respect you have earned.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will battle you with the respect you have earned.

string.last_approved_text: Old friend. Now enemies. So be it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Old friend. Now enemies. So be it.

string.last_approved_text: You are the enemy of reason. You must fall.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are the enemy of reason. You must fall.

string.last_approved_text: China deserves better than the likes of you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China deserves better than the likes of you.

string.last_approved_text: China demands me as its champion, not you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China demands me as its champion, not you!

string.last_approved_text: You low-minded fool. Prepare to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You low-minded fool. Prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: These ones are known. Theirs ways are understood.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These ones are known. Theirs ways are understood.

string.last_approved_text: Remember these foes, and remember how to fight them.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Remember these foes, and remember how to fight them.

string.last_approved_text: Ah, old enemies emerge once more. Again, we fight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ah, old enemies emerge once more. Again, we fight.

string.last_approved_text: If I remember correctly… yes yes, these ones again…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If I remember correctly… yes yes, these ones again…

string.last_approved_text: You have besmirched my honour. I shall have justice!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have besmirched my honour. I shall have justice!

string.last_approved_text: That so base an enemy could defeat me? Bah!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: That so base an enemy could defeat me? Bah!

string.last_approved_text: What has been done before will be undone now!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What has been done before will be undone now!

string.last_approved_text: China weeps for my defeat. She shall soon cheer my victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China weeps for my defeat. She shall soon cheer my victory!

string.last_approved_text: Oh, who comes now? New enemies to fight?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Oh, who comes now? New enemies to fight?

string.last_approved_text: Treat both new and old with a warrior's respect.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Treat both new and old with a warrior's respect.

string.last_approved_text: Any enemy of mine is an enemy of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Any enemy of mine is an enemy of China!

string.last_approved_text: China weeps to see so many enemies of truth.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China weeps to see so many enemies of truth.

string.last_approved_text: There must be some way to defeat this enemy..

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There must be some way to defeat this enemy..

string.last_approved_text: Sigh. If it seems impossible, maybe it is…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Sigh. If it seems impossible, maybe it is…

string.last_approved_text: If it is to be defeat again, so be it…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If it is to be defeat again, so be it…

string.last_approved_text: I will never relent, even against such a foe.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will never relent, even against such a foe.

string.last_approved_text: Your spirit is impressive. Mine more so.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your spirit is impressive. Mine more so.

string.last_approved_text: Come again, if you must. I will not falter.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come again, if you must. I will not falter.

string.last_approved_text: How will you fight this time? Shall we see?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How will you fight this time? Shall we see?

string.last_approved_text: Arrogant to try to beat me again, is it not?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Arrogant to try to beat me again, is it not?

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: As I watched Luoyang smoulder, I knew that someone must put a stop to the darkness consuming China. I knew too that it could only be me. I will take this fight to Dong Zhuo, and any other who would seek to exploit China; wherever, whenever, however.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As I watched Luoyang smoulder, I knew that someone must put a stop to the darkness consuming China. I knew too that it could only be me. I will take this fight to Dong Zhuo, and any other who would seek to exploit China; wherever, whenever, however.

string.last_approved_text: Are you truly deserving of my presence?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you truly deserving of my presence?

string.last_approved_text: What has been done to earn my strength?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What has been done to earn my strength?

string.last_approved_text: China may breathe a sigh, for I fight for them.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China may breathe a sigh, for I fight for them.

string.last_approved_text: Let dignity prevail, as it always must.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let dignity prevail, as it always must.

string.last_approved_text: We have done well thus far. I am content.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have done well thus far. I am content.

string.last_approved_text: As my needs are met, so too are China's.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As my needs are met, so too are China's.

string.last_approved_text: Prosperity and harmony; these I have in abundance.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Prosperity and harmony; these I have in abundance.

string.last_approved_text: Let us make my satisfaction all of China's.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us make my satisfaction all of China's.

string.last_approved_text: Another battle? How many now? Very well…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Another battle? How many now? Very well…

string.last_approved_text: Our cause is righteous. That is enough.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our cause is righteous. That is enough.

string.last_approved_text: How shall we fight this one? How indeed…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How shall we fight this one? How indeed…

string.last_approved_text: Heavens, give me a sign. Provide me direction!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Heavens, give me a sign. Provide me direction!

string.last_approved_text: I shall pierce your heart, traitor! Or your head…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I shall pierce your heart, traitor! Or your head…

string.last_approved_text: Your treason shall be your undoing!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your treason shall be your undoing!

string.last_approved_text: Put simply, you must be cut down.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Put simply, you must be cut down.

string.last_approved_text: It is time to take you to task, traitor.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to take you to task, traitor.

string.last_approved_text: I never dither! We must be swift, and put these forces down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I never dither! We must be swift, and put these forces down!

string.last_approved_text: Is this all? I suppose we must do quick and dirty work today.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Is this all? I suppose we must do quick and dirty work today.

string.last_approved_text: Move fast, then move on. There is no dignity in this work.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Move fast, then move on. There is no dignity in this work.

string.last_approved_text: The quicker we are done, the quicker we can be moving on.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The quicker we are done, the quicker we can be moving on.

string.last_approved_text: No more words of worry or woe. Only victory.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No more words of worry or woe. Only victory.

string.last_approved_text: However victory must be claimed, go and claim it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: However victory must be claimed, go and claim it!

string.last_approved_text: See victory this day, if you can!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: See victory this day, if you can!

string.last_approved_text: At last, let us be victorious for China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: At last, let us be victorious for China!

string.last_approved_text: Speak no more. These vermin must die.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Speak no more. These vermin must die.

string.last_approved_text: Bring me their heads. For China.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring me their heads. For China.

string.last_approved_text: Finally, these curs must surely face the sword!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Finally, these curs must surely face the sword!

string.last_approved_text: Take them to task. See these traitors brought low!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Take them to task. See these traitors brought low!

string.last_approved_text: Darkness will consume China, should we fall here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Darkness will consume China, should we fall here.

string.last_approved_text: We cannot die here. Such ignominy…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We cannot die here. Such ignominy…

string.last_approved_text: How has it come to this? I refuse to accept it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: How has it come to this? I refuse to accept it!

string.last_approved_text: We have to push them back. The alternative is unthinkable!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have to push them back. The alternative is unthinkable!

string.last_approved_text: The very fate of China hangs in the balance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The very fate of China hangs in the balance!

string.last_approved_text: All our fortunes ride aloft this battle.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: All our fortunes ride aloft this battle.

string.last_approved_text: Our full strength was demanded, so we have brought it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Our full strength was demanded, so we have brought it.

string.last_approved_text: China holds its breath. We must succeed.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China holds its breath. We must succeed.

string.last_approved_text: Yes, quite. Shall we proceed then?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Friend, you speak well. Shall we to battle?

string.last_approved_text: I am ready, comrade, when you are!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Excellent words; even I could not do better.

string.last_approved_text: Battle awaits, and victory too!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is as if I spoke the words myself. Well put!

string.last_approved_text: Let us speak more later, after the battle.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You speak with honesty and clarity, friend.

string.last_approved_text: China cannot wait a moment longer - to war!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: What wise words! You speak with beauty!

string.last_approved_text: Change is marching, let us meet it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Honest and justly spoken; let us to battle!

string.last_approved_text: You speak well, but now battle is upon us!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your dignity shines like a beacon. Let it lead the way!

string.last_approved_text: Draw your sword, comrade, because battle calls!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your integrity is astounding. It will serve us well.

string.last_approved_text: For China's sake, I will let you live. Fight well.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: For China's sake, I will let you live. Fight well.

string.last_approved_text: Do what you can. I do not expect much from you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do what you can. I do not expect much from you.

string.last_approved_text: If we win, excellent. If you die, even better!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If we win, excellent. If you die, even better!

string.last_approved_text: Live or die, I expect your best.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Live or die, I expect your best.

string.last_approved_text: You are insufferable, but useful I suppose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are insufferable, but useful I suppose.

string.last_approved_text: Fall on your blade if you lack the courage.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fall on your blade if you lack the courage.

string.last_approved_text: Find your courage, and bother me no more.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Find your courage, and bother me no more.

string.last_approved_text: Bring me victory or begone from my sight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring me victory or begone from my sight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, quite. Shall we proceed then?

string.last_approved_text: Your integrity is astounding. It will serve us well.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Draw your sword, comrade, because battle calls!

string.last_approved_text: You are odious, but fate has made us allies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are odious, but fate has made us allies.

string.last_approved_text: Your ignorance astounds me. Still, I expect you to fight.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your ignorance astounds me. Still, I expect you to fight.

string.last_approved_text: Please, be silent. Your voice irritates me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Please, be silent. Your voice irritates me.

string.last_approved_text: Would you stop talking? Please. It bores me.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Would you stop talking? Please. It bores me.

string.last_approved_text: I tire of your words, let us see action!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I tire of your words, let us see action!

string.last_approved_text: Can you even fight? Then less talk; prove it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Can you even fight? Then less talk; prove it!

string.last_approved_text: Your words are wind. Fight, at last!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your words are wind. Fight, at last!

string.last_approved_text: I have waited long to see you fail. I will wait longer.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have waited long to see you fail. I will wait longer.

string.last_approved_text: Ours is a brotherhood forged in fire! Come…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ours is a brotherhood forged in fire! Come…

string.last_approved_text: Together, victory is inevitable. Nothing can stop us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, victory is inevitable. Nothing can stop us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am honoured to be fighting with you today.

string.last_approved_text: You shall face justice, as we all must.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You shall face justice, as we all must.

string.last_approved_text: In the end, traitor, you have undone yourself.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: In the end, traitor, you have undone yourself.

string.last_approved_text: You are beyond even my help now.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are beyond even my help now.

string.last_approved_text: You are sullied by your own actions, traitor.

string.last_approved_text: The leaves fall... So too must our enemies.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The leaves fall... So too must our enemies.

string.last_approved_text: The colours change. What does this portend, I wonder?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The colours change. What does this portend, I wonder?

string.last_approved_text: Nature sheds her skin. But we must remain steadfast.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Nature sheds her skin. But we must remain steadfast.

string.last_approved_text: Remain unchanging, even as the world changes around us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Remain unchanging, even as the world changes around us.

string.last_approved_text: Ah, spring. New life. New hope. New China.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ah, spring. New life. New hope. New China.

string.last_approved_text: Let the zeal of spring inspire us to victory!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let the zeal of spring inspire us to victory!

string.last_approved_text: Observe China's beauty, and remember what you fight for.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Observe China's beauty, and remember what you fight for.

string.last_approved_text: Bright days, crisp breezes! Yes, a day for fighting!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bright days, crisp breezes! Yes, a day for fighting!

string.last_approved_text: The heat is relentless. I, too, will not stop.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The heat is relentless. I, too, will not stop.

string.last_approved_text: We cannot be slowed by the heat. We march!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We cannot be slowed by the heat. We march!

string.last_approved_text: Let us be like the sun, friends. Proud and furious!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us be like the sun, friends. Proud and furious!

string.last_approved_text: Be smart, friends. Do not overspend your energies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Be smart, friends. Do not overspend your energies!

string.last_approved_text: Winter advances, to be sure, but we must not relent.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Winter advances, to be sure, but we must not relent.

string.last_approved_text: The ice claws at us, but ignore it. Focus!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The ice claws at us, but ignore it. Focus!

string.last_approved_text: Do not let winter claw at your resolve. Come!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not let winter claw at your resolve. Come!

string.last_approved_text: May the cold and the dark take China's foes!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: May the cold and the dark take China's foes!

string.last_approved_text: Yes! An enemy at last! Come, fury!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes! An enemy at last! Come, fury!

string.last_approved_text: No more waiting around! There are enemies to kill!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No more waiting around! There are enemies to kill!

string.last_approved_text: I will break them all! None shall survive!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will break them all! None shall survive!

string.last_approved_text: I will rip these dogs apart!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will rip these dogs apart!

string.last_approved_text: They brought allies? What COWARDS! They ALL must die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They brought allies? What COWARDS! They ALL must die!

string.last_approved_text: Allies? Fine! More of them to kill!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Allies? Fine! More of them to kill!

string.last_approved_text: Bring as many as you want - NONE shall survive!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring as many as you want - NONE shall survive!

string.last_approved_text: It seems they need friends to help them lose!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It seems they need friends to help them lose!

string.last_approved_text: We have allies? These fools don't stand a chance!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have allies? These fools don't stand a chance!

string.last_approved_text: Together we will tear these imbeciles to pieces!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together we will tear these imbeciles to pieces!

string.last_approved_text: Come, friends, come, allies - to war!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, friends, come, allies - to war!

string.last_approved_text: These allies are unnecessary… but welcome, I suppose.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These allies are unnecessary… but welcome, I suppose.

string.last_approved_text: These fools have no RIGHT to this city!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: These fools have no RIGHT to this city!

string.last_approved_text: Smash their heads against these walls!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Smash their heads against these walls!

string.last_approved_text: No mercy for invaders! Destroy them all!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: No mercy for invaders! Destroy them all!

string.last_approved_text: Teach them the folly of this incursion. Kill them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Teach them the folly of this incursion. Kill them!

string.last_approved_text: BORING! I am coming for you!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: BORING! I am coming for you!

string.last_approved_text: Your prattle is driving me to drink!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your prattle is driving me to drink!

string.last_approved_text: Come on, come on, come on!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come on, come on, come on!

string.last_approved_text: You are WASTING my TIME!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are WASTING my TIME!

string.last_approved_text: They face their doom! Crush them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They face their doom! Crush them!

string.last_approved_text: Win here, and they are gone FOREVER!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Win here, and they are gone FOREVER!

string.last_approved_text: Leave no trace of them! NONE!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Leave no trace of them! NONE!

string.last_approved_text: History will forget them. WE will destroy them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: History will forget them. WE will destroy them!

string.last_approved_text: Do not hesitate! Don't even think! Crush them here!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not hesitate! Don't even think! Crush them here!

string.last_approved_text: They are set up before me, ready to knock down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They are set up before me, ready to knock down!

string.last_approved_text: I am going to destroy them all. Here. Now!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am going to destroy them all. Here. Now!

string.last_approved_text: When I am done, they will be ERASED!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: When I am done, they will be ERASED!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

string.last_approved_text: Make no mistake; I will outdo you today!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Make no mistake; I will outdo you today!

string.last_approved_text: You are dogs, nothing more! Ha! I will destroy you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are dogs, nothing more! Ha! I will destroy you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I spit my drink at you, cowards and traitors!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The nights draw in; darkness falls.

string.last_approved_text: The hour grows late. Time for a drink?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The hour grows late. Time for a drink?

string.last_approved_text: As winter comes to crush autumn, let us crush our enemies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As winter comes to crush autumn, let us crush our enemies!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us harness the rage of nature's death!

string.last_approved_text: A new season for war. Let us get to it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A new season for war. Let us get to it!

string.last_approved_text: Let battle be joined amongst the blooming world!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let battle be joined amongst the blooming world!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Nature fights again; so do we!

string.last_approved_text: A drink to the new season, and to battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A drink to the new season, and to battle!

string.last_approved_text: Gah, it is too hot! Bring me a drink!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Gah, it is too hot! Bring me a drink!

string.last_approved_text: Let us be as merciless and brutal as the sun!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us be as merciless and brutal as the sun!

string.last_approved_text: We have bloody business to do; never mind the heat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We have bloody business to do; never mind the heat!

string.last_approved_text: Let us be furious like the blazing sun!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let us be furious like the blazing sun!

string.last_approved_text: The barren land gives no quarter. Neither must we!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The barren land gives no quarter. Neither must we!

string.last_approved_text: Winter cannot quench my fury! Nothing can!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Winter cannot quench my fury! Nothing can!

string.last_approved_text: We must war, even in this unforgiving climate!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must war, even in this unforgiving climate!

string.last_approved_text: Cold. So cold. Let battle heat our warring souls!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Cold. So cold. Let battle heat our warring souls!

string.last_approved_text: This world is full of fools, waiting for death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This world is full of fools, waiting for death.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ack! Another emperor in waiting. Utterly boring.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bloodlines. 'Destiny'. 'Dynasties'. How… tiresome.

string.last_approved_text: Stand in my way, die. It is very simple.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stand in my way, die. It is very simple.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, bring all your allies. I will kill you all

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring as many allies as you want. They cannot save you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not trust many, but I will accept your help.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I hope these 'allies' fight well.

string.last_approved_text: Fight admirably, allies, I'm watching.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fight admirably, allies, I'm watching.

string.last_approved_text: Do not disappoint me, friends. I am unforgiving.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not disappoint me, friends. I am unforgiving.

string.last_approved_text: We spilled blood taking this place. Turn them away!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We spilled blood taking this place. Turn them away!

string.last_approved_text: They cannot have the efforts of our toil!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They cannot have the efforts of our toil!

string.last_approved_text: The glories of this city are ours alone!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The glories of this city are ours alone!

string.last_approved_text: Greedy dogs! Go back to your hovels!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Greedy dogs! Go back to your hovels!

string.last_approved_text: Gah! You talk so much and fight so little!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Gah! You talk so much and fight so little!

string.last_approved_text: Are you all so preoccupied with your delusions of grandeur!?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Are you all so preoccupied with your delusions of grandeur!?

string.last_approved_text: Can you FIGHT? Or do you just whine and complain?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Can you FIGHT? Or do you just whine and complain?

string.last_approved_text: Enough! Fight me, you hand-fed puppets!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Enough! Fight me, you hand-fed puppets!

string.last_approved_text: They never really had a chance, did they?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They never really had a chance, did they?

string.last_approved_text: There's glory to be found amongst their ruined hope.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There's glory to be found amongst their ruined hope.

string.last_approved_text: Their biggest mistake was crossing me…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Their biggest mistake was crossing me…

string.last_approved_text: Now they see the price of opposing me: death!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Now they see the price of opposing me: death!

string.last_approved_text: They send everything against us. So… destroy them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They send everything against us. So… destroy them!

string.last_approved_text: I smell their fear. They have everything riding on this.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I smell their fear. They have everything riding on this.

string.last_approved_text: Your strength is an illusion. You'll see…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your strength is an illusion. You'll see…
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!

string.last_approved_text: Traitors and dogs, prepare - I'm coming!
