string.last_approved_text: I'm coming for you, you bloody dogs!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I'm coming for you, you bloody dogs!

string.last_approved_text: Time to rip apart some traitors!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Time to rip apart some traitors!

string.last_approved_text: Leave nothing for the birds - kill every traitor!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Leave nothing for the birds - kill every traitor!

string.last_approved_text: Pushed to the brink! I will not die. Not here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Pushed to the brink! I will not die. Not here.

string.last_approved_text: Wealth fades, but my glory will endure…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Wealth fades, but my glory will endure…

string.last_approved_text: They will remember me for this battle, I am sure.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will remember me for this battle, I am sure.

string.last_approved_text: They will not beat me here. Not now…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: They will not beat me here. Not now…

string.last_approved_text: Fight with fury - there is no turning back!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Fight with fury - there is no turning back!

string.last_approved_text: Only forwards! There is no glory in defeat!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Only forwards! There is no glory in defeat!

string.last_approved_text: History will not remember me if we fail here.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: History will not remember me if we fail here.

string.last_approved_text: There is no glory but that which we seize for ourselves!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no glory but that which we seize for ourselves!

string.last_approved_text: You are a capable warrior; prove it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a capable warrior; prove it!

string.last_approved_text: I look forward to seeing you fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I look forward to seeing you fight!

string.last_approved_text: There are riches to be won today, my friend!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There are riches to be won today, my friend!

string.last_approved_text: Today let us be showered in glory, friend!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Today let us be showered in glory, friend!

string.last_approved_text: Come, friend, the battle calls to us.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, friend, the battle calls to us.

string.last_approved_text: Together, we will see this all burn!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, we will see this all burn!

string.last_approved_text: It will ALL crash down. We will see to it.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It will ALL crash down. We will see to it.

string.last_approved_text: My friend, let us break this all apart, together.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My friend, let us break this all apart, together.

string.last_approved_text: I will cut my enemies down, then YOU!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will cut my enemies down, then YOU!

string.last_approved_text: If you cannot be useful, then die.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If you cannot be useful, then die.

string.last_approved_text: Your words anger me, witless fool!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your words anger me, witless fool!

string.last_approved_text: Bah. Do the world a favour and begone.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bah. Do the world a favour and begone.

string.last_approved_text: China does not need your vacuous opinion.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China does not need your vacuous opinion.

string.last_approved_text: Do not become an obstacle to my ambition.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do not become an obstacle to my ambition.

string.last_approved_text: If you cross me, you will be destroyed.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: If you cross me, you will be destroyed.

string.last_approved_text: I will gladly cut you down, given the chance.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I will gladly cut you down, given the chance.

string.last_approved_text: The time has come to topple these fools!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The time has come to topple these fools!

string.last_approved_text: The world waits no longer - to battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The world waits no longer - to battle!

string.last_approved_text: Glory and fame shall be mine!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Glory and fame shall be mine!

string.last_approved_text: The time is now; victory awaits!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The time is now; victory awaits!

string.last_approved_text: Tear down these fools! Let us fight!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Tear down these fools! Let us fight!

string.last_approved_text: Talk no longer! We ride to battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Talk no longer! We ride to battle!

string.last_approved_text: This world is not meant for them. Not anymore!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This world is not meant for them. Not anymore!

string.last_approved_text: It is time to take our fight to the enemy!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is time to take our fight to the enemy!

string.last_approved_text: You have much to prove, and very little time.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have much to prove, and very little time.

string.last_approved_text: I am seriously considering killing you… argh! Focus!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am seriously considering killing you… argh! Focus!

string.last_approved_text: You have your uses, but you are a cur!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You have your uses, but you are a cur!

string.last_approved_text: Another word and I cut out your tongue!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Another word and I cut out your tongue!

string.last_approved_text: I do not care for words - only action!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I do not care for words - only action!

string.last_approved_text: Prove your worth; come on!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Prove your worth; come on!

string.last_approved_text: Talk talk talk. Dull! It is time to battle!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Talk talk talk. Dull! It is time to battle!

string.last_approved_text: Show me you are more than just words!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Show me you are more than just words!

string.last_approved_text: Stick with me, and we'll do great things.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Stick with me, and we'll do great things.

string.last_approved_text: Together, we'll destroy all these would-be emperors.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, we'll destroy all these would-be emperors.

string.last_approved_text: Worthwhile brothers are rare; you do me proud.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Worthwhile brothers are rare; you do me proud.

string.last_approved_text: Yes, brother! Let's teach these pompous fools a lesson!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, brother! Let's teach these pompous fools a lesson!

string.last_approved_text: Come, let us tear down their dreams!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Come, let us tear down their dreams!

string.last_approved_text: You are my sworn kin. I need no other!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are my sworn kin. I need no other!

string.last_approved_text: China will be ruled by the strong, or by none at all!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China will be ruled by the strong, or by none at all!

string.last_approved_text: There are few I trust; you are one.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There are few I trust; you are one.

string.last_approved_text: Worthwhile sisters are rare; you do me proud.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Worthwhile sisters are rare; you do me proud.

string.last_approved_text: Yes, sister! Let us teach these pompous fools a lesson!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Yes, sister! Let us teach these pompous fools a lesson!

string.last_approved_text: Your words are NOTHING. Be silent and die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your words are NOTHING. Be silent and die!

string.last_approved_text: Why waste your breath? You will be dead soon!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Why waste your breath? You will be dead soon!

string.last_approved_text: You stand in the way of my ambition. Time to die!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You stand in the way of my ambition. Time to die!

string.last_approved_text: You are a dog and will die like one!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You are a dog and will die like one!

string.last_approved_text: Summer is gone; I can finally breathe!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Summer is gone; I can finally breathe!

string.last_approved_text: Summer is gone; and so soon shall they be!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Summer is gone; and so soon shall they be!

string.last_approved_text: Bring me glory amongst the falling leaves!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Bring me glory amongst the falling leaves!

string.last_approved_text: Cut them down like harvesting grain!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Cut them down like harvesting grain!

string.last_approved_text: Spring at last. I was sick of the cold.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Spring at last. I was sick of the cold.

string.last_approved_text: Leave them bleeding amongst all the pretty flowers.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Leave them bleeding amongst all the pretty flowers.

string.last_approved_text: Ah, what wonderful weather for war!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ah, what wonderful weather for war!

string.last_approved_text: Let their blood water the fields of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Let their blood water the fields of China!

string.last_approved_text: Hot or cold; I don't care - kill them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hot or cold; I don't care - kill them!

string.last_approved_text: Kill them before the sun does! Simple.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Kill them before the sun does! Simple.

string.last_approved_text: There is no time to waste; cut them down!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There is no time to waste; cut them down!

string.last_approved_text: The sun is punishing; we must be moreso!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The sun is punishing; we must be moreso!

string.last_approved_text: It's too cold. Battle will warm us up!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It's too cold. Battle will warm us up!

string.last_approved_text: Run them down; let them freeze!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Run them down; let them freeze!

string.last_approved_text: Battle will keep us from freezing! Have at them!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Battle will keep us from freezing! Have at them!

string.last_approved_text: Winter. Bah! I hate winter! Let us be quick!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Winter. Bah! I hate winter! Let us be quick!
We shall leave nothing but their broken bodies!
We will overcome these foes today. We must!
Be patient. Be vigilant. We will lead these fools to destruction!
None can stop us - especially not these loathsome fools!
They have strength in their allies. Be patient…
Do not rush to battle, or their allies will overwhelm us.
They have allies. Blood and effort will win this...
Be wary of their friends; a united front is dangerous.
Present to them a united, harmonious force.
May our allies share our glory in victory!
Our allies will be a boon in the battle to come!
Bolstered by our allies, our chances are much improved!
We toiled for this city; we will not give it up!
For China's sake, we must hold here!
Push back these thoughtless beasts!
Hold the gates, man the barricades! Give no ground!
Your prattle brings disharmony. Cease, and fight!
Only through your silence can I know peace.
China has no time for your stupidity. Quiet! Fight!
I seek harmony. Your words portend chaos! Battle awaits!
We have waited for this chance to crush them
One last push, and they are destroyed forever.
Our patience is rewarded with this final battle.
Be mindful; soon this will be over, and our foes finished.
Today's victory will hasten their defeat.
They have brought so many to die…
Hold firm against their might; victory through resolve.
This battle is our chance to hurt them, perhaps fatally.
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Come. Fight me. I am ready this time!
I am far beyond the novice you fought before!
Having thought on my defeat, I have decided: never again.
I vow I will not suffer defeat again!
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
I hope their skills have improved since last time.
May I recommend more effort this time, perhaps?
I believe in you. Do YOU believe in you?
Have care, friend, for I will not show mercy.
In the name of stability, I must cut you down, friend.
My friend, I am sorry; you have chosen poorly.
We must battle, it seems. There is no other choice.
I have waited a long time for my revenge…
Finally, you will face my blade, cur!
Prepare yourself; I have been waiting for this moment!
With your death China will be a better place!
Temper rages against resolve; we fight these dogs again!
It seems our blades must clash once more.
Another bout? To the fray, then!
Did you forget the last lesson? Very well then!
We cannot let ourselves feel the sting of defeat again.
Consider our last defeat, and we will realise victory.
Know yourself, and know your enemy. Then we will win.
No more defeats. Only victory!
An unknown foe is a dangerous foe. Be wary.
Be mindful; do not underestimate this foe.
We must uproot our foes, whoever they may be!
Harmony can only be achieved through victory over adversity.
Let our bruises remind us; we must do better!
Though we have never defeated them, we must try.
Only through understanding can we gain victory.
Find harmony within, then we shall defeat them.
Do not let our victories twist into foolhardy arrogance.
...we have defeated them before; take heart!
Our victories bring harmony. Keep them up.
With each victory, we grow stronger and stronger.
The future is clouded, and disharmonious…
We must achieve more. We must strive higher!
Instability threatens to undo all our work…
This campaign lacks care, lacks thought..
Ours is the path of clarity and stability.

string.last_approved_text: We must look to our future... China's future.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We must look to our future... China's future.
We have worked hard to reach this point.
Our diligence has borne fruit. Now, onwards!
As the wind conveys change, let us carry victory.
Through patience, we will see victory.
Fight with your all, and victory will be our reward.
China will only know stability through our victory.
Behold these villains, undeserving of even your rage!
These cowardly filth before us are less than men.
At last, I can reward you for your deceit!
Finally, I will put an end to your disharmonious deeds!
For China's stability, we must dispatch with these fools swiftly.
This is not a wholesome battle, nor will it give us glory, but it must be done.
If we are to unify China, these foes must be swept aside. See it done.
See to these oafs quickly and efficiently, then we can move on.
We have thought long enough. Now, battle is come.
To battle then, friends. Fight hard, and claim victory.
Now, victory awaits to he who fights the hardest.
Give your all today, friends. Tomorrow is waiting.
A traitor waits for death. Oblige them!
These dogs have slighted you. Now, for revenge!
There can be no harmony whilst this savage yet lives.
At last. It is time for this traitor to fall.
How has it come to this? Win, or die!
We stand on the precipice of destruction. We cannot falter!
Only victory here ensures we fight another day!
We either fight hard to survive, or we die.
If we fall here today, all will be undone.
So much rests on this outcome. Bring victory!
Fight hard, for defeat may be our end!
All our ambitions ride on this battle. Do not fail!
We are of one mind, friend. Harmonious.
Let nothing deter us today, friend.
We must fight as one, until we have victory!
Considered words, friend; now let us prepare!
Patience, friend - victory will be ours in time.
We must find our centre - then we will know success.
We understand each other. Let us go forward as one.
We will find victory one way, or another.
To think, that you could cost us victory…
Why must you be here. Why you?
I have no time to ponder you. Fight, would you?
Will you be a help or a hindrance?
Do not prove my worries correct. Please.
You are part of my plan, but only temporarily.
Enough of your disingenuous talk. Battle is coming.
I seek harmony. You bring discord. Be silent.
It is time to destroy them, do you not agree?
Come now, send them back to the weeds!
Save your words; let them know destruction!
Come now, comrade, the enemy waits for death!
Ours is the strength of the earth: indomitable!
We cannot be stopped. Our enemies will fall! Let us fight!
There is no option but victory. Let us go!
Our enemies must die. They must die now.
I beg of you, silence. No more empty rhetoric!
Your words bring disharmony. Please, be silent.
I lament that we must fight together…
So much talk, yet such little substance. Please, focus!
I expect you to fight, not talk, so get to it!
Can you talk less? I would be surprised.
Do your best. Try not to die.
Try to come back alive, if you can.
We will work hard for victory this day, brother.
This is what we were born to do, brother!
Yes! Together, we will bring harmony to China!
We must be prepared to do our part!
Come, brother, let us strike them down!
Our enemy will soon know our primal fury!
You are the solid foundation for our strength!
Together, we can hold back any assault!
We will work hard for victory this day, sister.
This is what we were born to do, sister!
Come, sister, let us strike them down!
You are unworthy of my respect, traitor.
You and your deception shall fall today!
Do not presume you have the right to speak.
Traitor! Save your breath. Do not speak.
The air cools. These are favourable conditions.
The roots of the earth endure even in the colder months…
Unlike the leaves, we will not wither on the branch.
We will not yield. We will endure!
Spring is rebirth and victory; let us be also!
The world wakes to our impending victory!
We must be as patient as the blossoms.
Take strength from the bounteous ground, friends!
The earth is indifferent. Only determination will yield victory.
We must fight all the harder against this punishing heat.
The sun beats down, but we must press on.
We must endure through this savage summer sun.
The air is icy cold. My breath freezes!
Stay warm by fighting all the more fiercely, friends!
We must fight through the cold, for China!
All of China freezes. We must be her still-warm heart!
Let these fools rush to meet their doom!
Our foes must be crushed!
They will soon be erased from history.
Their corpses will soon litter the battlefield!
The enemy are bolstered by allies. Feeble hand-holders!
Let their allies come; we shall see them off!
They wish to waste allied forces too!? Hah, fine.
What cowards bring allies to fight!?
Our combined fury will surely overwhelm them!
I do not need help, but if they insist…
I am perfectly capable of fighting them alone…
I am sure this battle will be won even quicker now.
This place WILL remain ours, now and tomorrow!
Their advance stops here. We will repel them!
We must defend this city, it is our duty!
We will do as we must and hold these walls!
Silence! Are words your only weapon? Draw your blades!
Your words are empty! Save your precious breath!
Alternatively, you could surrender? No? Very well.
You speak well, but you will still die.
This is their last chance. Take this city; vanquish them!
It is time to consign them to history.
The poets will write histories of their destruction today.
Storm these walls. Take this city. Let them vanish!
Overcome this horde, and the enemy will be hobbled.
Give not an inch. Throw them back. Crush them!
This is the core of their strength. Destroy it!
Destroy them! Leave nothing for them to rally around!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!

We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Let this general come. I will not fail again!
I will reclaim the victory stolen from me!
My blade and my wits are sharper this time!
I will see you fall!
I welcome another victorious duel against this warrior.
They may seize victory in this bout. Yet I doubt it.
My blade sings in anticipation of another duel!
I will give you the chance you desperately seek!
I take no joy in this, friend. But duty comes first.
With a heavy heart, but noble purpose, we must fight.
Once I called you brother, now we are foes.
Once a faithful companion. Now an enemy. Very well.
Once I called you sister, now we are foes.
I shall - no, I MUST - crush you!
I will not squander this opportunity to exact justice!
You will be crushed beneath my ambition!
You cannot halt the future of China!
If it is decreed we must fight again, so be it.
If our paths must cross a hundred times, so be it!
Fate sees fit to join us once more!
You again! Hmmph! So be it.
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
Now for vengeance against a baleful foe!
Sharpen your steel - this time we win!
Things will be different this time; this I vow!
These new foes will soon bend to our will.
Do they not know who it is they face?
The unknown is dangerous. Keep your guard up.
Will these new foes bend to our will?
They are formidable foes, soaked in our blood.
Too many times have we tasted defeat. No more!
Frustrating foes! I will have my victory!
My ambition cannot be halted by… by you!
Past victory is no guarantee of future victory.
Overconfidence is the obituary of many an army.
As ever, we must not relent before these foes.
Do not give them a chance for vengeance!
My determination wavers. It is an ill omen…
The horizon broods, as does my heart…
I pray our cause does not deviate any further.
Do not give me further reason to doubt…
Our cause is just! We should never relent!
We can defeat any adversary, so long as we persist!
Any obstacle can be overcome by our unyielding spirit!
Under our steady hand, China will know peace!
We fight because it is our duty!
Only through our control can China know peace.
I will not waver from this path.
We shall remain steadfast before any foe.
Your death will see justice finally served!
You stand accused of treason, you savage dog!
You cannot thwart my ambition, traitor!
You will bend to my will or be destroyed!
Nothing can stand in our way. Especially not this rabble.
Cast these fools aside so we may return to business.
It is gruesome task, but it must be done. So get to it.
The sooner we start, the better, for then it will be over more swiftly.
Now, let us fight, for a stable, unified China!
In victory our ambitions are realised - let us go!
We shall stand amongst their broken corpses before long!
When this day is done, we shall be victors!
I have a score to settle; march!
Let your vengeful ardour carry you to victory!
Do not stop until these traitors are dead!
I have an appetite for revenge - let us sate it!
Today, we look death in the eye. Hold that gaze!
Victory is our only option. There is no alternative.
No. I will not break. I refuse! Not… not now!
I am the unbreakable blade. Throw them back!
We must succeed here. Defeat would be disastrous.
I am not asking you to win, I am TELLING you.
There is too much at stake. We MUST win!
I trust you understand the gravity of the situation.
Come. Let us go forward to battle.
There is strength in your words. Come, then.
Wisdom indeed! Now let us get to it!
With me, friend; your heady words can wait!
My friend, never let your ideals flicker!
In this war of ideals, friends, we have already won!
Let us bring great change to China, together.
We are as one mind, friend - we cannot be stopped!
Why are you here? I can handle this alone.
If you are to fight, stay out of my way!
I will bring change to China. You will bring ruin.
Plainly, I do not trust you. Watch yourself.
Given the chance, I would kill you.
Watch out; it is dangerous out there.
Maybe you can be changed, but I doubt it.
Are you worth redemption? I think not.
Let us see your strength. China is watching.
Well said - now let your words become action.
Do not rush into battle. Be patient and thoughtful.
Choose your moves carefully; fight with wisdom.
Be knowledgeable, yet unpredictable; victory will follow
Do not let your convictions waver. Stand firm!
Now let us show them the strength of our beliefs.
It is time for their ways to end!
You lack strength. And yet redemption is possible…
Why am I saddled with your burdens?
We must still fight together - for my sins…
Let us see if you can at least fight…
Let us see you fight. I have my doubts.
Are you here to help? How amusing.
I will await you on the far side of victory.
See if you can keep up with me!
No matter what, let unity be our strength, brother!
Our bond is forged in the fires of war!
Honour and devotion will be our weapons. Look forward!
Together, brother, we will unify China!
We are beyond their petty attempts at disunity.
We shall hold fast as one, even as everything burns.
There shall be a great feast when victory is ours!
Together, we shall bring transformation to China!
No matter what, let unity be our strength, sister!
Together, sister, we will unify China!
I will not suffer a traitor's words! Silence!
They speak, and I am angered.
Is this not proof they all should die?
Hold fast against these traitors' words. They know nothing!
Stand tall, and vibrant, even as the world sheds its life.
Do not be disheartened by autumn's flight, friends.
Nature flies to death as we fly to battle!
Like a tree shedding leaves, we must abandon our doubts!
The world desires our victory; let us not disappoint!
A bright and fresh new day, perfect for battle!
Nature's constant renewal should inspire us all!
Endeavour to be as enduring as the perennial spring!
We must fight the persistence of the summer heat.
Do not relent, even as the sun bears down.
Do not weaken your resolve in this oppressive heat.
The world wearies in summer, but we must not!
Let us be like the cold grasp of winter.
Ice-cold steel; it calls for victory.
We shall drench the frozen ground in their blood!
My ambition does not halt for any season.
We shall wash these insects away in righteous deluge!
They are wretched, but not without skill. Be cautious.
I will drown our enemies in a tide of justice!
Be wise. Keep your wits about you. Kill them.
We should be cautious. Together, they are formidable.
Be cautious! They bring allies, to inundate us.
We will be washed away if we are not careful…
Keep your focus. Do not let their allies swarm.
Let none stand against our unified strength!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Together we are a tidal wave, sweeping away our enemies!
Fight well, knowing our allies support us!
This place is vital; we must not lose it!
Stand tall against these tumultuous waves!
Push these brigands back! Defend the city!
They cannot be allowed a foothold here!
I am here to fight you, not listen to this nonsense.
Quite finished? Shall we do our duties now?
Focus! Your purpose is war, not oratory.
Do not lecture me on war. Draw your swords.
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
This is it. Wash them away, never to return!
Today we end their struggle. Forever.
When we are done, there will be nothing left of them.
Without this army, they are exposed.
If they are defeated here, they will have nothing.
Their lands will be free to claim. Defeat them here!
Today, we will cripple their campaign for good.
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!

Come. Fight me. I am ready this time!
I am better prepared than when last we duelled.
Another bout; I must not make the same mistakes…
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
They may seize victory in this bout. Yet I doubt it.
I welcome any opportunity to hone my skills.
I will flow and repel, time and time again.
Once a faithful companion. Now an enemy. So be it.
I take no joy in this, friend. But duty comes first.
Our cause, friend, cannot pause for our friendship…
I must focus on duty and not our friendship…
I will not squander this opportunity to exact justice!
You have long opposed me. Now, I will destroy you.
You have long been a problem, but no longer!
Our long rivalry ends here, fiend!
…we know these ones and their ways. Plan accordingly!
Be wise. Remember these enemies. Fight smart.
Do not forget how these ones fight. Be bold!
Know your enemy… remember these words!
…they have bested us before. Be vigilant. Be smart.
Learn from our past errors, and we shall win.
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
Like the mighty Yangtze, overcome these tenacious foes.
Every enemy has potential strength. Be cautious.
Master Sun teaches caution in the face of the unknown…
There is strength in mystery. Do not be arrogant.
A stranger tide washes upon our shore…
Let our bruises remind us; we must do better!
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
Our past misdeeds must be accounted for. Seize victory!
This cannot go on. We either win, or die!
Do not let our past victories twist into foolhardiness!
Overconfidence is the obituary of many an army.
Past glory is no guarantee of future victory.
There is cause for optimism, but not for arrogance.
A storm brews upon our ocean. It is… disconcerting.
My days are long. Filled with doubt. Where does this lead?
My mind is askance, clouded. I worry.
Is this truly the best course for China?
We wield great power. Our enemies shall soon see.
Wise and considered strategy will give us countless victories!
We shall be carried along by a wave of victory!
Our tide is rising, swelling with victory!
Our strategies must be flexible. Through change, victory.
Be fluid, friends, and we will rush to victory.
Be smart, and be thoughtful. They will not stand a chance.
They will be drowned by our strategies.
I cannot abide traitors. You, dog, will face justice!
You will be drowned by your injustices, traitor!
Treacherous coward; prepare to face justice!
Choose the manner of your destruction, traitor!
Wash these fools away. They are not worthy of our time.
There are greater deeds to be done. Yet duty demands these ones be dealt with now.
When you are done here, we shall move on. Do not dally.
Unpleasant business, this, but all the same… deal with them.
Potent words, all - let your actions be mightier!
Be wise in battle, and glorious in victory!
I can ask no more than you do your duty.
Find wisdom, and victory will surely follow. Onwards!
Treason can face only a deluge of justice.
Be as the torrential rain, and sweep these traitors away.
Talk is cheap! Bring these vermin to ruin!
For all this talk, the enemy still breaths. Onward!
A series of miscalculations has led to this…
We face oblivion. Hm. What could have changed this…
The outcome may be grim, but it is not foregone.
Push back, and survive! There is no alternative!
Be like the mighty river; wash them away.
We have committed much; do not squander this opportunity.
The bulk of our force is here; defeat cannot be allowed.
If we are defeated here, we are hobbled.
Yes, friend, well put. Now, may we do that justice.
Indeed! Now let powerful words become powerful deeds.
It is as you say, friend. War is our only option.
We hold great power, friend. Let us destroy our enemies!
Come, friend, let us take the fight to them.
We stand upon the precipice; time to fight!
Your words are fair, but it is time for action!
Let us talk more once our enemies are dead!
Enough! Enough! Will you ever give me peace?
Why must you darken my day so?
Please say no more; battle is waiting.
If you fall in battle, I will think it just.
I earnestly pray that this battle is your last.
I will not miss you, should you die.
Can you fight? Or simply talk?
I loathe you, but perhaps you can fight…
Be persistent, and determined, and we will see victory!
Now is the time for endless determination!
We must be as the incoming tide - relentless!
Drown our enemies; let them choke on defeat.
I hope you prove to be an earnest companion.
Comrade, let us seek wisdom and victory together.
Be swift, and smart, and we will see glory.
They will find only defeat at the end of our blades.
Your words are nought but wind. Be bold!
Your prattle is of little help! Fight, instead!
Please, be silent. We have more pressing matters.
We must focus on battle, not on your redundant thought.
You speak too much, and fight too little.
I long for your silence, that we may finally fight.
Our enemy will surely be bored to death by now.
Are you ready to fight? Or yet more words?
Your words are calming, brother. To the battle, then?
Wise and thoughtful words. Let us give them meaning!
Let us put strength behind those words, my friend!
The time is now to enact those intelligent words!
Wisely spoken; now let us do your words justice!
Let us flow as one and wash our enemies away!
There is no other I would wish to battle alongside!
Let us now, together, see victory won!
Your words are calming, sister. To the battle, then?
You have held back the tide of change too long!
You are a traitor and shall be washed away!
The tide rises against you, traitor!
A storm is coming. It will sweep you all away!
The leaves fall, but we must remain resolute.
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
The days may shorten, but we cannot rest early.
Keep your resolve, even as the dark encroaches.
Nature is renewed. We, too, must refresh our purpose.
As the cycle begins anew, keep focus on our cause.
Though the world is reborn, its purpose remains unchanged.
Let our duty be as bright and determined as the spring!
The sun, high and heavy, reflects our weighty responsibility.
Though the sun burns us all, we must do our duty.
Our duty remains, even in this savage heat.
Flow like a mighty river, unyielding in the drought.
The shadows grow long, the nights grow darker…
The cold bites at us, yet we must march.
There is warmth to be found once battle is done.
We must be swift, before we all freeze here.

string.last_approved_text: Though the tortoise blessed with magic powers lives long, its days have their allotted span; though winged serpents ride high on the mist, they turn to dust and ashes at the last; and a noble-hearted man, though advanced in years, never abandons his proud aspirations.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though the tortoise blessed with magic powers lives long, its days have their allotted span; though winged serpents ride high on the mist, they turn to dust and ashes at the last; and a noble-hearted man, though advanced in years, never abandons his proud aspirations.

string.last_approved_text: It is plain that the Mandate of Heaven has been lost to the Han. Yet do not presume, cruel tyrant, that it falls to you. You, Dong Zhuo, are the architect of China's chaos, and only through your defeat can order be finally restored.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is plain that the Mandate of Heaven has been lost to the Han. Yet do not presume, cruel tyrant, that it falls to you. You, Dong Zhuo, are the architect of China's chaos, and only through your defeat can order be finally restored.

string.last_approved_text: And you suppose the heavens will choose YOU to be emperor? Hah, show me your strength then, strategist. We shall see how you fare against my fury!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: And you suppose the heavens will choose YOU to be emperor? Hah, show me your strength then, strategist. We shall see how you fare against my fury!

string.last_approved_text: There has been opportunity in these dark times - I see you have harnessed it, just as I have. Great heroes are forged in the chaos of China, as ever it has been. Order will rise from disharmony. That you oppose me is disappointing but not… unexpected.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: There has been opportunity in these dark times - I see you have harnessed it, just as I have. Great heroes are forged in the chaos of China, as ever it has been. Order will rise from disharmony. That you oppose me is disappointing but not… unexpected.

string.last_approved_text: Your ambition has been laid bare, Lord Cao. Order cannot be restored under your name, but under a prosperous and just Han restoration. You have no place there!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Your ambition has been laid bare, Lord Cao. Order cannot be restored under your name, but under a prosperous and just Han restoration. You have no place there!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!

string.last_approved_text: I admit, my son, that your shrewdness and strategic mind do impress me; it is comforting to know my kin are possessed of my vision and skill.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I admit, my son, that your shrewdness and strategic mind do impress me; it is comforting to know my kin are possessed of my vision and skill.

string.last_approved_text: Your mind is shrewd, and your strategies are cunning. I am impressed, yes, but your theoretical victories must translate into practical ones.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China will benefit from an ordered mind such as yours, in time. But first, we must bring peace and stability under the heavens!

string.last_approved_text: Do I impress you, Father? Has my effort at long last reaped the rewards I wished?

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Do I impress you, Father? Has my effort at long last reaped the rewards I wished?

string.last_approved_text: From your tutelage, Father, I have grown and learned. Perhaps, one day, I will surpass even your legacy.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: From your tutelage, Father, I have grown and learned. Perhaps, one day, I will surpass even your legacy.

string.last_approved_text: China will benefit from an ordered mind such as yours, in time. But first, we must bring peace and stability under the heavens!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: China will benefit from an ordered mind such as yours, in time. But first, we must bring peace and stability under the heavens!

string.last_approved_text: Ahhh. Once I called you a trusted captain, but now I see you as little more than an insidious rat. Betraying me cannot bring the order that you crave; only a powerful, ruthless ruler can do that. I hold the reigns of the Han, and shall guide it to glory once more. And you? You will die here, and be forgotten, forever!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ahhh. Once I called you a trusted captain, but now I see you as little more than an insidious rat. Betraying me cannot bring the order that you crave; only a powerful, ruthless ruler can do that. I hold the reigns of the Han, and shall guide it to glory once more. And you? You will die here, and be forgotten, forever!

string.last_approved_text: Traitor! Every last man who opposes me is a traitor! But you, I thought more of you! It is to be expected, I suppose; at every turn I have been deceived, degraded and denied. If I must take my revenge on all of China, then so too will I take my revenge on you! Come, spineless fool; my next spear shall strike true!

string.last_approved_text: My friend, long have we known one another, and long have we fought together. Since we were students under Lu Zhi, to the fracturing of our nation, to now. I hope that together, we can use all we have learned to rid the land of this chaos!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My friend, long have we known one another, and long have we fought together. Since we were students under Lu Zhi, to the fracturing of our nation, to now. I hope that together, we can use all we have learned to rid the land of this chaos!

string.last_approved_text: Together, my old friend, we can forge a new China, a better China. Let us see to it!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Together, my old friend, we can forge a new China, a better China. Let us see to it!

string.last_approved_text: This darkness in China is born of the darkness in men's hearts. Through callous, dishonourable deeds, 'great' men try to doom this country. Yet you, noble Zhang Liao, stand apart. We may be foes, but you are beyond reproach. Though we may be opposed, I am gladdened that there are still those in China who hold honour above all.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: This darkness in China is born of the darkness in men's hearts. Through callous, dishonourable deeds, 'great' men try to doom this country. string.last_approved_text: Though we do not share a name, I do most certainly call you brothers! For we shall live, and fight, and die as one!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Though we do not share a name, I do most certainly call you brothers! For we shall live, and fight, and die as one!

string.last_approved_text: Aye! Through our actions, let us avenge the nation above and pacify the people below. There are many paths, but we walk the same one, together!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Aye! Through our actions, let us avenge the nation above and pacify the people below. There are many paths, but we walk the same one, together!

string.last_approved_text: Though we were not born on the same day, or the same month, or the same year, we hope to die upon the selfsame day. And should our friendship waver, may heaven and the people both strike us down!

string.last_approved_text: We find ourselves on the battlefield together, it seems. Are we to show our enemies that we are a unified force then? I will not suffer to linger in your shadow.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We find ourselves on the battlefield together, it seems. Are we to show our enemies that we are a unified force then? I will not suffer to linger in your shadow.

string.last_approved_text: I much prefer fighting alongside you to fighting against you; such ferocity is terrifying in an opponent, and in a wife!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I much prefer fighting alongside you to fighting against you; such ferocity is terrifying in an opponent, and in a wife!

string.last_approved_text: As your power grows, my worries increase. One such as you cannot rule China - you may hope to restore order, but the Mandate of Heaven will never be yours!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: As your power grows, my worries increase. One such as you cannot rule China - you may hope to restore order, but the Mandate of Heaven will never be yours!

string.last_approved_text: The Mandate was lost to the Han long ago! Your opportunism is admirable, your ignorance is not! I cannot allow even the heirs to the Han to drag China back into the abyss.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: The Mandate was lost to the Han long ago! Your opportunism is admirable, your ignorance is not! I cannot allow even the heirs to the Han to drag China back into the abyss.

string.last_approved_text: It is tragic, yet unmistakable; one of my own kin stands against me today. It is a grim business, to see families torn by war, divided in purpose, but I cannot relent now, even if I must stand against family. The restoration of the Han dynasty is above all else. I must see it done!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: It is tragic, yet unmistakable; one of my own kin stands against me today. It is a grim business, to see families torn by war, divided in purpose, but I cannot relent now, even if I must stand against family. The restoration of the Han dynasty is above all else. I must see it done!

string.last_approved_text: I have known you long, Gongsun Zan; since we were young students - much more spry and impetuous than we are now I think!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have known you long, Gongsun Zan; since we were young students - much more spry and impetuous than we are now I think!

string.last_approved_text: Hah. Maybe so, old friend, but there is courage in what we do now, do you not think? We are fighting for all of China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Hah. Maybe so, old friend, but there is courage in what we do now, do you not think? We are fighting for all of China!

string.last_approved_text: More than China, friend, for the Mandate of Heaven itself! China must be ruled by a strong and just Han dynasty. Only we have the power to create that reality!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: More than China, friend, for the Mandate of Heaven itself! China must be ruled by a strong and just Han dynasty. Only we have the power to create that reality!

string.last_approved_text: I feel a chill in your presence, my Lady Sun, but I cannot doubt your strength in battle. I only hope you do not see fit to turn your wrath upon your husband…

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I feel a chill in your presence, my Lady Sun, but I cannot doubt your strength in battle. I only hope you do not see fit to turn your wrath upon your husband…

string.last_approved_text: I will turn my wrath upon any so deserving of it; this I have always done. Today, our foe is most worthy of our combined rage, so let us see to it then!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: We find ourselves on the battlefield together, it seems. Are we to show our enemies that we are a unified force then? I will not suffer to linger in your shadow.

string.last_approved_text: I have lived long, and seen much, but never did I think I would see Liu turn upon Liu. The betrayal is not only to your brothers and sisters, but also to the Han - if the dynasty is to ever survive, then these treasons must be quelled - by force, if required...

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I have lived long, and seen much, but never did I think I would see Liu turn upon Liu. The betrayal is not only to your brothers and sisters, but also to the Han - if the dynasty is to ever survive, then these treasons must be quelled - by force, if required...

string.last_approved_text: My kin, why is it that we must fight? I am already moved to distrust every other man who claims to want to heal China's wounds, I wish I did not have to doubt my own family, too. But if you will openly oppose me, I suppose there is no choice but battle.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: My kin, why is it that we must fight? I am already moved to distrust every other man who claims to want to heal China's wounds, I wish I did not have to doubt my own family, too. But if you will openly oppose me, I suppose there is no choice but battle.

string.last_approved_text: You tyrannical oaf! Did you think I would serve as your lapdog forever? Yours is a cruel strength, but mine is the fury of ten thousand men! Your campaign of destruction shall end here, and the slights I have suffered shall be repaid - I shall have your body used as tallow for a candle; I am certain your bloated corpse will burn for a generation!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: You tyrannical oaf! Did you think I would serve as your lapdog forever? Yours is a cruel strength, but mine is the fury of ten thousand men! There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!

string.last_approved_text: Long have I waited for this moment, Lord Cao. I do not know if you remember, but you have butchered countless members of my family. I can no longer suffer this injustice; I shall cut you apart - that you might know a fraction of the pain I feel.

string.last_approved_text: I am sorry that your family were in my way, but the price of treason is death. So it has been, and so it shall be again.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: I am sorry that your family were in my way, but the price of treason is death. So it has been, and so it shall be again.

string.last_approved_text: So I meet the Crouching Dragon at last; my patience has finally been rewarded. They say you are a most brilliant strategist, and a loyal comrade. It is a pity, then, that we are on opposing sides. Yet as with all the others, you will fall - my ambition cannot be stopped!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: So I meet the Crouching Dragon at last; my patience has finally been rewarded. They say you are a most brilliant strategist, and a loyal comrade. string.last_approved_text: Ah, Sima Yi. I have heard much talk of your strategic prowess - they say it is second to none. They say that I have some knowledge of tactics, so I confess to some interest in this result. Above all, however, I shall endeavour to see your defeat - China cannot be led by one so insidious as you!

string.last_approved_text: Though we are on opposing sides of this war, I know you as an honourable warrior, and a gracious man. When this war is done, I hope that China can be governed by equally honourable and gracious administrators.

string.last_approved_text: We have long been friends and comrades, Zhou Yu, and so it is with pride and joy I march with you today. There is no other I would rather have at my side, and there is no other I would hope to rebuild China with. Let our victory here lay the foundations!

Long have I waited for this moment, Lord Cao. I do not know if you remember, but you have butchered countless members of my family. I can no longer suffer this injustice; I shall cut you apart - that you might know a fraction of the pain I feel.

Long have I waited for this moment, Lord Cao. I do not know if you remember, but you have butchered countless members of my family. I can no longer suffer this injustice; I shall cut you apart - that you might know a fraction of the pain I feel.

So you claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of Heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor - by such criteria, it cannot be you.

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress - by such criteria, it cannot be you.

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.

I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor - by such criteria, it cannot be you.

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: Ah, the Little Conqueror marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn - I think him overzealous!

string.last_approved_text: A conqueror is just another word for victor. If victory is to be my namesake, then I accept it gladly. I shall see victory, for myself, for my ancestors, and for China!

loading_screen_speech_strings.string: A conqueror is just another word for victor. If victory is to be my namesake, then I accept it gladly. I shall see victory, for myself, for my ancestors, and for China!
We shall leave nothing but their broken bodies!
We will overcome these foes today. We must!
Be patient. Be vigilant. We will lead these fools to destruction!
None can stop us - especially not these loathsome fools!
They have strength in their allies. Be patient…
Do not rush to battle, or their allies will overwhelm us.
They have allies. Blood and effort will win this...
Be wary of their friends; a united front is dangerous.
Present to them a united, harmonious force.
May our allies share our glory in victory!
Our allies will be a boon in the battle to come!
Bolstered by our allies, our chances are much improved!
We toiled for this city; we will not give it up!
For China's sake, we must hold here!
Push back these thoughtless beasts!
Hold the gates, man the barricades! Give no ground!
Your prattle brings disharmony. Cease, and fight!
Only through your silence can I know peace.
China has no time for your stupidity. Quiet! Fight!
I seek harmony. Your words portend chaos! Battle awaits!
We have waited for this chance to crush them
One last push, and they are destroyed forever.
Our patience is rewarded with this final battle.
Be mindful; soon this will be over, and our foes finished.
Today's victory will hasten their defeat.
They have brought so many to die…
Hold firm against their might; victory through resolve.
This battle is our chance to hurt them, perhaps fatally.
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Come. Fight me. I am ready this time!
I am far beyond the novice you fought before!
Having thought on my defeat, I have decided: never again.
I vow I will not suffer defeat again!
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
I hope their skills have improved since last time.
May I recommend more effort this time, perhaps?
I believe in you. Do YOU believe in you?
Have care, friend, for I will not show mercy.
In the name of stability, I must cut you down, friend.
My friend, I am sorry; you have chosen poorly.
We must battle, it seems. There is no other choice.
I have waited a long time for my revenge…
Finally, you will face my blade, cur!
Prepare yourself; I have been waiting for this moment!
With your death China will be a better place!
Temper rages against resolve; we fight these dogs again!
It seems our blades must clash once more.
Another bout? To the fray, then!
Did you forget the last lesson? Very well then!
We cannot let ourselves feel the sting of defeat again.
Consider our last defeat, and we will realise victory.
Know yourself, and know your enemy. Then we will win.
No more defeats. Only victory!
An unknown foe is a dangerous foe. Be wary.
Be mindful; do not underestimate this foe.
We must uproot our foes, whoever they may be!
Harmony can only be achieved through victory over adversity.
Let our bruises remind us; we must do better!
Though we have never defeated them, we must try.
Only through understanding can we gain victory.
Find harmony within, then we shall defeat them.
Do not let our victories twist into foolhardy arrogance.
...we have defeated them before; take heart!
Our victories bring harmony. Keep them up.
With each victory, we grow stronger and stronger.
The future is clouded, and disharmonious…
We must achieve more. We must strive higher!
Instability threatens to undo all our work…
This campaign lacks care, lacks thought..
Ours is the path of clarity and stability.
