Even in winter, bamboo does not break; stay strong!
Some trees flourish. Others must die...
They are a blight on all of China.
They will cause anguish no longer.
To save China, I must end these enemies!
They seek strength in numbers? Let them try.
Our roots run deep. Brute strength cannot upturn them.
They have allies. Be cautious. Bend, do not break.
They have brought allies to aid them. Be cautious.
Through our alliance, we will see victory.
Together with our allies, we will redeem China!
Our generous allies will help us seize victory!
The enemy cannot hope to stand against our alliance!
The people must be defended from these savage invaders!
This city is too vital, they must not take it!
Have these dogs no compassion? We must defeat them!
From these walls, we will send them to their graves!
All this empty talk! Will we ever battle!?
You are tiresome bores. Come, battle awaits!
Do not waste time, it only delays your defeat!
All this talk masks your fear. Come on, battle is calling!
Our branches grow and strangle. None can stand against us.
Today they will fall, and we shall ascend.
Soon they will be no more than mulch for the forests.
I wish them an honourable defeat, but nothing more.
With a sharp, powerful cut, this tree shall fall.
Today we cut not the branches but the very root!
They are defenceless without this force. Defeat it!
Uproot their strength here, and they are done!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We must crush these insects!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
This will be no different to the last time.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
My friend, how has it come to this?
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Long have I waited for this moment…
It is time we finally settled the score…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I have come for these traitors!
Let us be done with this.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Time for them to die.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We have no choice but to win today.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Well said. Let us look forward.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You speak true.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
When you speak, I groan. To business!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Come along, your words can wait.
That is certainly an opinion.
They are ready, why aren't you?
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You speak with honour, brother.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
You speak with honour, sister.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
It is time to die, traitor.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Defeat is temporary. I shall have victory.
The past is the past. We grow towards the future.
Victory will be mine. Defeat will be erased.
Draw your blade, brigand! I will cut you down!
Bamboo stings so savagely, does it not?
Another bout? Another defeat, my friend.
Another rousing duel? Why not!
Let history repeat; let my victory be heralded!
The branch that breaks is no longer of the tree…
Friend, you have strayed far, too far…
What have you become, my dearest friend?
Why, my friend, have you chosen this path?
I will savour this opportunity. At long last...
Brigand, you face your death!
Long have I awaited this…
Prepare, knave! A reckoning comes!
A cold wind blows many times, and many times again…
As the seasons turn, an old enemy returns…
Once more we are drawn to battle one another.
Through constant battle, we gain understanding…
We may bend, but shall strike back more ferociously.
We are returned, stronger than before.
We shall see victory, through bold endeavour!
We dare to fight again. We shall win!
It is the unknown, creeping vine, that can choke the mightiest tree.
Be wary, be cautious. They are not friends…
Aggressive newcomers; they must be defeated.
I feel these newcomers are not gracious folk…
Though battered, we shall never break.
To yield to you is to yield China itself. Never!
We must persist. Everything depends on it!
You are savage opponents, but we will not relent!
We bend but never break. Through this, we see victory.
We cannot yield to these foes. Never!
Victory before. Victory again!
They cannot defeat us. We cannot allow it.
I feel a rot set in. I worry…
There is a foulness to this cause…
The branch may bend only so much before breaking.
Much is asked of us, but for what?
Our roots are strong; we will achieve much.
If we are bold, and strong, victory will be ours.
All of China will benefit from our success.
We must do what is needed, for China.
We must be willing to bend, but never break.
Like the mighty bamboo, we endure and thrive.
Envision an ideal China, then make it reality.
From our minds springs action. From action, victory.
This one is pestilent; he must be removed!
Traitors are a blight. They must be excised.
We must cut these traitors down.
Treason, like any infection, must be burned away…
It is unpleasant business, but let us be quick and merciful.
It is often the sharpest strike that fells the tree fastest…
Not all buds become mighty oaks. Some must be pruned.
We should move quickly. Once we are done here, we can move on…
Now, be driven - like the hurricane - to victory!
Now, China watches; fight in her name!
Let no odds dampen our zeal; victory shall be ours!
Now, friends, together let us claim victory!
Now let us put these enemies of China to the sword!
Talk is done; let us kill these traitors!
Bring me their liar's heads!
Their deceit ends now, with our victory!
Our mighty tree stands alone against the deadly typhoon…
That we might see tomorrow, we must win today.
There are but two options; victory, or obliteration.
Hold fast, and fight. To fail is to be destroyed!
For China's sake, we have brought our all.
We must be victorious, or face dark times.
Without victory here, our days are numbered.
The core of our strength is here. Should we fail…
Sage words, friend. They shall echo through history.
I cannot wait to fight alongside you, friend!
You are a mighty bough; unbreakable! It is comforting.
Your words embolden me! Let us do great deeds!
My friend, let us fight for our ideals!
You speak earnestly, and inspiringly. Now look to battle.
Your strength will lead us to victory, friend.
Let China's new beginning start here, my friend.
Not all trees can live. Some must die…
Should you fall, the earth will grow strong from you.
I have brought you for your strength. Nothing else.
You may be terrible, but you can fight.
Win the battle, then I will reconsider your life…
Should I cut you down? No. Not yet…
You distress me. Do your duty. Be silent.
Must you talk? It brings nothing but pain.
Be flexible, and victory will surely come.
Never break, even before the most furious strength.
Your words do not reach them. Only action will.
The time for talk is over. Shall we fight?
Come, ride with me now; to battle.
I shall share the glories of victory with you!
Bend but never break. Always remember this.
The hour of battle has come. Fight with me!
Speak less. It pains me to listen to you.
I can hardly endure you. But I must persevere…
You bring disharmony. Please, no more talk.
It is time for battle! Please be silent.
I doubt your potential. Prove me wrong.
Are you strong enough? Show me.
Can you truly bring victory? Truly?
I look forward to seeing how you fare today.
You speak boldly. Shall we, then?
Yes, well said! Now let battle be joined.
How true! Now let us go forward!
Proud words, brother! To the battle then!
Together, sworn friend, we will achieve our victory!
In unity, we will strike our enemies down!
There is no other I would rather fight with today.
Bring your strength, sworn kin, and they will fall.
Proud words, sister! To the battle then!
You are a vermin and you will be purged!
Like a vine, you are choking the life from China.
You must be defeated. Traitors must die!
There is no room for treason in China!
The moon bids we be victorious; do not disappoint!
We fight as nature crumbles and recedes…
Beneath the hues of autumn, battle is joined…
The dance of nature slows, and we march.
Dormant buds now burst forth into action!
As the world turns, nature is illuminated.
The forests grow, the plants blossom, and war comes.
As the trees begin to grow, we too must strike out.
Let us be as furious as the blazing sun.
The sun is capricious; it both gives life, and drains it.
The sun is at our back; victory will be ours!
Do not let the heat concern you; only victory!
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
Let victory manifest like breath on the wind!
Break through the freezing air to victory!
Even in winter, bamboo does not break; stay strong!
